job_description:
About the job
            
 
Senior Strategy Consultant - Dutch speakingNewForesight Consultancy is een toonaangevend en wereldwijd opererend consultancy bureau op het gebied van duurzame markt transformaties. We werken dag in dag uit aan een toekomst waarin bedrijven, organisaties en overheden de duurzame oplossing kiezen. We zijn op zoek naar een Senior Strategy Consultant voor het TransMission domein die gelooft in duurzame oplossingen en hier vol passie mee aan de slag wil.Waarom zou je bij ons willen werken?Omdat je ambitieus bent en die ambitie kwijt wil bij een organisatie met hoge ambities. We werken aan de grootste duurzaamheidsuitdagingen van onze tijd en willen groeien. We hebben een internationaal team waar de voertaal Engels is. Jij kunt hier deel van uitmaken.Je sluit je aan bij een organisatie met een duidelijke visie en identiteit, die is ge√Øntegreerd in alles wat we doen. Ons geloofssysteem: Wij geloven dat complexe duurzame transities kunnen worden gemanaged en dat de kracht van markten en samenwerking essentieel is;Onze ambitie: Wij willen systemisch werken en impact maken;Onze merkbelofte: Wij zijn de thought leader in duurzame markttransformatie en ondersteunen partners in elke stap van hun reis;Onze ideale partners: Wij willen samenwerken met besluitvormers in organisaties die invloed kunnen uitoefenen op hun markt.
We zijn een organisatie waar ieders mening wordt gewaardeerd en waar verantwoordelijkheid niet afhankelijk is van je titel maar van je bekwaamheid. We geloven dat verantwoordelijkheid leidt tot groei, en we zullen je helpen deze groei vorm te geven.Persoonlijke en professionele ontwikkeling is heel belangrijk voor ons. Alle medewerkers krijgen een mentor die hen begeleidt in hun ontwikkeling en mentees ondersteunt bij het opstellen van een Persoonlijk Ontwikkelingsplan (POP). Jouw POP wordt in elk project besproken om ervoor te zorgen dat je aan je ontwikkelingsgebieden kunt werken. We bieden het hele jaar door interne trainingen aan, evenals een opleidingsbudget voor externe trainingen, en we hebben tweemaal per jaar 360-graden evaluatierondes.Het TransMission domeinJe zult als Senior Strategy Consultant werkzaam zijn in het TransMission domein. Dit domein zet zich in om onze economie√´n en markten te transformeren tot effici√´nte, duurzame, circulaire, regeneratieve, inclusieve en eerlijke systemen. In de komende drie decennia hebben we een cruciale taak voor de boeg, met name in sectoren die momenteel de meest significante nadelige effecten veroorzaken: voedsel en landbouw, energie, bouw en infrastructuur, ICT, logistiek en mobiliteit, textiel, productie en de chemische industrie.Om deze ambitieuze doelstellingen te bereiken, presenteren we TransMission - de missie gedreven transitiebenadering ontwikkeld door NewForesight, Nyenrode Business Universiteit en het Copernicus Instituut voor Duurzame Ontwikkeling.TransMission biedt een praktische en duidelijke standaard voor transitiebeheer waarmee we in staat zijn om: De dynamiek van complexe systemen te analyserenEffectieve strategie√´n te ontwikkelen voor overgangenDeze overgangen te initi√´ren, co√∂rdineren en versnellen
Voor meer informatie over TransMission kun je hier terecht: https://www.newforesight.com/transmission-institute/De rol van Senior Strategy ConsultantJe komt terecht in een jong, internationaal, divers en zeer gemotiveerd team dat wil groeien. Je zult je richten op de volgende kerntaken.Uitvoeren van projecten voor onze partners: Ongeveer 60% van je tijd zal je bezig zijn met projecten. Dat kan in de rol van projectmanager zijn of als inhoudsdeskundige. Er wordt verwacht dat je je visie en ervaring kunt inzetten om het project tot een succes te maken. Je zult werken aan projecten die structurele, duurzame veranderingen in sectoren bevorderen. Meestal werk je samen met een Senior Advisor en √©√©n of twee Analisten.Business Development: Ongeveer 30% van je tijd ben je bezig met het ontwikkelen van nieuwe kansen. Dit kan betekenen dat je aanwezig bent op conferenties en netwerk events om met bestaande relaties te spreken en nieuwe contacten op te doen. Je geeft presentaties, workshops en trainingen en je bent actief bezig om het gedachtegoed achter TransMission verder te ontwikkelen. Je zoekt naar mogelijke samenwerkingen en plant gesprekken om onze oplossingen te verkopen. Ook schrijf je proposals voor het aangaan van nieuwe projecten. Er wordt verwacht dat je een pro-actieve houding aanneemt ten opzichte van business development en je eigen positionering in de markt. Onderdeel hiervan is regelmatige externe communicatie via de website en social media.Leren en ontwikkelen: De rest van de tijd, zeg 10%, ben je bezig met het ontwikkelen van je persoonlijke en professionele vaardigheden. Je volgt en geeft trainingen, je ondersteunt medewerkers in hun werkzaamheden en je draagt bij aan de ontwikkeling van de organisatie door interne projecten op te pakken.Wat neem je mee? Masterdiploma in een relevant vakgebied (bijv. Economie, Sociale Wetenschappen, Sustainability).Bewezen staat van dienst in consultancy of in een consultancy rol.Ruime ervaring in het leiden van een team van consultants en het vermogen om een team te laten groeien en ontwikkelen.Sterke analytische vaardigheden, met het vermogen om complexe gegevens te verzamelen en interpreteren, trends te identificeren en bruikbare inzichten te trekken.Uitstekende communicatieve vaardigheden, zowel schriftelijk als mondeling, waardoor effectieve betrokkenheid bij klanten en het leveren van overtuigende presentaties en rapporten mogelijk is.Aantoonbare ervaring in projectmanagement, inclusief het vermogen om interdisciplinaire teams te leiden en projecten binnen het budget en de tijdslijnen te voltooien. Gestructureerd projectmanagement is cruciaal om projecten succesvol af te ronden.Bewezen track record op het gebied van business development.Passie voor duurzaamheid, sociale rechtvaardigheid en het stimuleren van positieve verandering in duurzame transities.Vloeiend in het Engels.
Wij bieden een dynamische en inclusieve werkomgeving, waar jouw expertise en innovatieve idee√´n zullen bijdragen aan transformerende projecten in verschillende industrie√´n. Je krijgt de kans om te werken met een divers team van professionals die gepassioneerd zijn over duurzaamheid en maatschappelijke impact.Wat kun je van ons verwachten? Sociale en impactgedreven groep mensen die onder andere maandelijkse borrels hebben (en vaak nog veel vaker) en projectafsluitingen vieren met diner en drankjes.Een jaarcontract op basis van een 40-urige werkweek.Een basissalaris in de range van ‚Ç¨4,452,- tot ‚Ç¨5,220,-. Het salaris zal gebaseerd zijn op ervaring.Jaarlijkse bonus afhankelijk van bedrijfs- en individuele prestaties (kan vari√´ren van √©√©n tot twee maanden).Een vakantietoeslag van 8%.25 vakantiedagen per jaar.Opleidingsbudget van ‚Ç¨2,500,- per jaar.OV-treinkaart als je buiten Utrecht woont.Een solide pensioenregeling.Bedrijfslaptop.Telefoonvergoeding.Maandelijkse massagesessie op kantoor.Gesubsidieerde gezamenlijke lunch.Gesubsidieerde jaarlijkse bedrijfsweekendtrip, waar het hele team op een lang weekendtrip ergens in Europa gaat.
Word je hier enthousiast van en ben je klaar om grote duurzaamheidsuitdagingen aan te gaan? Solliciteer dan via de onderstaande link! Sollicitaties worden doorlopend behandeld.

About the job
            
 
We are seeking a brilliant, motivated and committed Senior Insights & Strategy Consultant to join our team in Barcelona.  A Piece of Pie is a global strategy consultancy on a mission to rethink how businesses make decisions. We combine the human sciences with business acumen to arrive at ground-breaking solutions to improve people‚Äôs lives.  We are seeking a capable professional willing to grow professionally by supporting our global clients to find new ways to face high risk and challenges with high uncertainty and craft new avenues to help our clients differentiate in today‚Äôs competitive business world.  About the role At A Piece of Pie, we work in small, self-directed teams. As a Senior Strategy Consultant, you will be responsible for leading your teams, start to finish, through the successful execution of client projects. This may include scoping and designing the project, supporting the day-to-day work of your team, advising clients, and partnering with a manager to further develop a client relationship.  Responsibilities  Project Management  Independently run mid-to-large scale projects that combine qualitative and quantitative research, data analysis, insight development, and strategy development Thoughtfully design research to fit client objectives and constraints ‚Äì drawing on ethnography, foresight, and quant methods as appropriate Lead the translation of research into business relevant insight, strategy and value propositions, and further, into brand, product, and service platforms Serve as a trusted advisor to clients Ability navigate the unexpected Attention to detail to ensure quality in everything we do Able to identify and communicate highly actionable insights and strategies Ensure that projects are delivered within scope, on time, at high quality, and within budget 
 Business and Practice   Own the development of pitches and proposals for incoming RFPs Help develop our portfolio of methodologies and best practices. 
 People and Culture   Manage the distribution and pace of project work, balancing output with the wellbeing of your team Create an inspiring and inclusive Team dynamic Coach and develop team members using constructive feedback Foster the values of an intellectually ambitious and humble culture 
 Qualifications  The ideal candidate:   Knowledgeable and passionate about the intersection of business and social sciences Expertise in on cultural insight & foresight, quantitative research 4+ years of experience in a strategy consultancy (e.g. business strategy, innovation strategy, marketing strategy, brand strategy) Including 2+ years independently managing complex, multi-stage projects Including 2+ years in an advisory capacity to senior client stakeholders Including 2+ years of managing small teams multidisciplinary experts and a proven ability to develop, inspire, and collaborate with diverse teams Degree in a social science (e.g. anthropology) or business discipline (e.g. MBA) Deep knowledge of any of the following verticals: healthcare, consumer electronics, tech, finance, luxury, automotive, FMCG Proficiency in qualitative research methods and data management (e.g. ethnography, cultural & semiotic analysis, signal scanning) Expert in quantitative research methods and data management (e.g. surveys, market sizing, social listening), with deep knowledge of advanced statistical techniques (e.g. segmentation analysis, multivariate analysis, predictive modeling, regression analysis, conjoint analysis) English and Spanish fluency and German or French a big plus Able to handle ambiguity and divergent ideas Openness to new methodologies and processes 
 What we offer   Work at the office for the first 3 months, after that you can take advantage of a flexible hybrid work setup Exposure to high-impact projects with leading companies of the world Exciting variety of challenges from exploratory research to business innovation A fast-growing consultancy where your input and expertise plays part in steering the company forward 
 How to Apply  Please submit your resume/CV and cover letter (required) to careers@piecepie.com

About the job
            
 
Wir sind eine auf Digital Transformation spezialisierte Unternehmensberatung mit integrierter Softwareentwicklung. Unser agiles Team aus Beratern und Entwicklern bietet unseren Kunden von der Strategie √ºber die Konzeption bis hin zur Implementierung digitaler L√∂sungen alle Komponenten einer erfolgreichen Projektabwicklung. Daf√ºr arbeiten √ºber 50 Mitarbeiterinnen und Mitarbeiter an insgesamt 3 Standorten in Deutschland und Kroatien.Die Digacon GmbH wurde im Jahr 2020 zu den Top Consultants gew√§hlt und geh√∂rt zu den besten Beratern f√ºr mittelst√§ndische Unternehmen.Deine Aufgaben Bewertung von Projektanforderungen und Umwandlung in umsetzbare ErkenntnisseAktives Engagement in der der Vorbereitung, Konzeption und Durchf√ºhrung von Kunden-Workshops, Fachprozess-Beratung, Pr√§sentationen zur Ermittlung der Kunden- oder technischen Anforderungen sowie von Ist- und Soll- ProzessenEngagiertes √ºbernehmen von (Teil-)Projektleitung in spannenden Projekten als Trusted Advisor bei unseren KundenAnalyse und Optimierung von Abl√§ufen und bestehenden Prozessen mit Schwerpunkt organisatorische, prozessuale und technologische Fragestellungen im Kontext funktionsspezifischer HerausforderungenVerantwortlich f√ºr das Ermitteln und Erarbeiten von n√∂tigen Anpassungen in Kundenprojekten und Umsetzung der Spezifizierung f√ºr unsere EntwicklerBeteiligung an allen Phasen des Lebenszyklus in der Anwendungsentwicklung
Dein Profil Abgeschlossenes Studium der Betriebswirtschaftslehre, Wirtschaftsinformatik oder InformatikEinschl√§gige, mehrj√§hrige Berufserfahrung im Beratungsumfeld und gerne in der Leitung von Projektmodulen / TeilprojektenErfahrung in der Zusammenarbeit an der Schnittstelle zwischen Fachbereichen und agilen IT-TeamsEigenst√§ndige L√∂sungsfindungs- und ArbeitsweiseAffinit√§t & Erfahrung im Bereich Digitalisierung und ITGutes fachliches Verst√§ndnis von Kernbereichen im Digital Transformation UmfeldFreude an Teamarbeit und Bereitschaft zur √úbernahme von VerantwortungSehr gute Deutsch- und EnglischkenntnisseGrunds√§tzliche Reisebereitschaft
Benefits Beratung mit hervorragender WachstumsperspektiveIT Ausstattung und flexible Arbeitsmodelle: ausgewogene Mischung aus Home-Office und B√ºro-Pr√§senzMitarbeiterrabatteTransparente Karriereperspektiven sowie viel Raum f√ºr EigeninitiativeWeiterbildungsma√ünahmenSpannende und aktuelle Themen und Projekte

About the job
            
 
Job descriptionDive into a world of innovation with our flourishing SaaS company, Odyssee Field Service. We're currently scouting for a dynamic NL/FR Business Consultant to help customers get the most out of the Odyssee field service solutions Kick-start your career at Odyssee Field Service!The Impact You Will Make: You work together with your sales colleagues to maintain regular contact with our national and international customers. You listen to their needs, make a quick analysis and provide explanations about the Odyssee applications through personalized web demos.You ensure everyone receives the right information and you follow up the project.You also work together with the project manager and developers to implement projects and setup environments for new customers.You analyze the customer processes, you bridge the gap between their functional needs and the capabilities of the Odyssee solutions, you advise them on how to improve their field service processes.You gain an in-depth understanding of their workflow, identifying challenges, and re-evaluating field service processes. As you navigate this, maintaining consistent feedback with both the client and the project manager is imperative. You are entrusted with crafting the final documents (such as analysis, Fit-gap) that encapsulate the client's needs while aligning with the functionalities of our field service solutions.Following the technical developments, you ensure a seamless implementation of the solution and provide initial post-launch support.You work partly on-site with the customer, and partly from the (home) office. This balanced approach allows you to collaborate effectively with colleagues, account managers, and project managers to deliver excellent implementation services in various industries.
The Skills You'll Need: You hold a bachelor or master diploma in "IT" or "engineering" or any related fieldHaving between¬†2 or 3 years of experience in a similar jobYou have a consultancy-oriented mindset, with an ability to swiftly connect and establish trust with various stakeholders.You‚Äôre comfortable with API‚Äôs, connectors, master data, SQL querriesYou take ownership and deliver results. No need to micro-manage you, you go-getter you!You are fluent in Dutch, French and English. Other languages are welcome (The more the merrier!);You are a good, confident communicator. Your soft skills make the differenceYou have the will to have a maximum impact on Odyssee Field ServiceYou care deeply, genuinely, and are passionately concerned about the Odyssee customersExperience with enterprise software or SaaS is a plusKnowledge of field service processes is a plus
 What's In It For You? A vibrant, start-up feel work environment with a strong scale-up mentality.A competent team to surround and support you in delivering the best possible projectsA community where every input is valued.Clear career growth and development opportunities.A competitive salary and benefitsA blend of remote and office work.An exceptional work-life balance and flexible arrangements to maximize productivity and happiness
 About Odyssee Field ServiceJoin Odyssee Field Service, a growing Brussels-based SAAS scale-up. We've made our mark in the field service management solutions industry since 2008 and continue to expand.Empower field service teams and optimize machine maintenance processes for operational excellence. Our reach has now expanded beyond Europe into the USA, making us a diverse, international, and vibrant scale-up.

About the job
            
 
Hello! üëãWe are ClimateView, a climate tech and advisory company on the mission to help the world‚Äôs cities on their climate transition journey. We offer a unique opportunity to play a key role in tackling climate change at scale. Maybe you are already working with city climate strategy, but have this feeling that you want to make a bigger impact and help more cities reach their goals, faster. With ClimateOS in your hands, this is possible!The positionAs a Climate Strategy Advisor, your primary focus is to help cities succeed in their climate transition. You will meet our customers, the city climate heroes, as a natural part of our sales process when you set them up for success in driving change in their city. You will help them get onboarded on our platform and make sure they use it to its fullest potential, including learning from other cities and to share best practices between cities. As the primary contact for a portfolio of cities you will also be the voice of the customer to our product team, to help us improve and evolve our product. A successful long-term partnership with our customers is your target, and your subject matter expertise combined with your relationship building and result oriented personality is key to success.We believe the best way to meet the challenges we face is with a highly skilled, diverse and passionate team. You will be joining the commercial team and work side by side with inspiring colleagues, such as Orren (Director, Community), Yasmine (Customer Success Manager) to mention a few, and with support from Tomer, our founder. With your base in Sweden, you will join a fully remote and closely-knit team of bright individuals, passionate about their work and our joint mission.Qualifications & Skills  Climate strategy: Minimum 5 years‚Äô of experience from working with climate/sustainability strategy or planning.  Management consultancy: Minimum 3 years of experience from working as a consultant, with responsibility for handling own clients.  Stakeholder Management: Ability to lead, prioritize and work with tight deadlines, as well as coaching clients and adding new perspectives.  Interpersonal skills: Highly skilled relationship builder with strong collaboration skills and coaching skills.  Communication skills: Excellent written and presentation skills in both English and Swedish, and also French or German is a plus. 
About ClimateViewCities are home to the majority of emissions, people and resource use. The climate transition is an enormous challenge. Yet, it‚Äôs a chance not just to build green, but great cities. It‚Äôs ClimateView‚Äôs mission to help cities turn this challenge into an opportunity.The company was founded in Sweden in 2018, and today we are a passionate team of over 40 individuals ‚Äì from science, policy, consulting and tech ‚Äì across Europe. Alongside dozens of cities, regional and national authorities, we‚Äôve developed a framework, process and platform for a systematic approach to the transition. In each person we hire we seek commitment and curiosity to deeply understand the ecosystem we are a part of and the challenges we want to help cities to overcome.Interested?We look forward to receiving your application. We encourage you to apply as soon as possible as we consider applications on a rolling basis.

About the job
            
 
Wir suchen neue Senior-Mitarbeiter (m/w/d) f√ºr den Bereich Coaching & Consulting, die uns bei der Beratung & Betreuung unserer Berater, Coaches, Agenturen und weiterer Dienstleistungen helfen.Als Senior-Business-Consultant (m/w/d) arbeitest du eng mit unseren Unternehmern zusammen und setzt dich intensiv mit deren Gesch√§ftsmodellen auseinander. Nach der Einarbeitung bist du Experte und somit direkter Ansprechpartner f√ºr sie rund um die Themen Sales, Marketing, CRM, HR, Management und Gesch√§ftsprozesse.Aufgaben Du analysierst intensiv bestehende Unternehmensstrukturen und entwickelst ein zielf√ºhrendes Konzept zur Optimierung derselben.Du betreust dein eigenes Kundenportfolio und tauschst dich regelm√§√üig mit deinem Team zu aktuellen Kundencases, M√∂glichkeiten & Schwierigkeiten aus.Du entwickelst innovative Marketing- und Vertriebsstrategien und implementierst gemeinsam mit deinen Kunden bew√§hrte Social-Selling-Praktiken.Du kommunizierst proaktiv mit deinen Kunden und leitest 1:1-Coaching-, Onboarding- und Live-Calls mit spannenden F√ºhrungspers√∂nlichkeiten an.Du implementierst eine CRM-Grundlage (Hubspot) f√ºr eine langfristige Zusammenarbeit.Du baust dir ein eigenes Team auf und √ºbernimmst dabei eine f√ºhrende Managementposition.Du √ºbernimmst Verantwortung f√ºr interne Prozesse und versuchst diese eigenst√§ndig und durchdacht weiterzuentwickeln.
Qualifikation Du hast idealerweise eine abgeschlossene Berufsausbildung oder einen Bachelor-Abschluss.(Von Vorteil) Du hast eine abgeschlossene Ausbildung oder Erfahrung im Coaching.Du hast weitreichende Erfahrung in den folgenden Schwerpunkten: Strategie, Marketing, Verkauf, CRM.(Von Vorteil) Du hast bereits ein Team aufgebaut und verstehst, worauf es ankommt, Mitarbeiter einzustellen und zu f√ºhren.Du bist gewissenhaft, ordentlich und hast eine schnelle Auffassungsgabe.Du hast starke kommunikative F√§higkeiten und eine strukturierte Arbeitsweise.Du hast bereits Erfahrung im Umgang mit Social Media und LinkedIn (Erfahrung mit Hubspot ist ein Plus).Du bist sehr proaktiv und bringst gerne neue Ideen ein.Du bist eigenverantwortlich und absolut zuverl√§ssig.Du kannst bestehenden Prozessen folgen und diese aber auch weiterentwickeln.Du m√∂chtest nicht nur beruflich, sondern auch pers√∂nlich wachsen.
Benefits Verg√ºtung: √úberdurchschnittliches Einstiegsgehalt + Provisionsm√∂glichkeiten.Optimale Ausstattung: Du bekommst dein eigenes MacBook, das sowohl zum Arbeiten als auch f√ºr den privaten Gebrauch zur Verf√ºgung gestellt wird.Eigenverantwortliches Arbeiten: Freiheit durch Eigenverantwortung ‚Äì Ziele erreichen statt Zeiten absitzen.Karrierechancen: √úber die n√§chsten Jahre werden wir weiter wachsen und expandieren. Dazu ben√∂tigen wir weitere Experten und/oder F√ºhrungskr√§fte.Umfangreiches Gesundheitssystem: Erhalte Zugriff auf √ºber 300 Gesundheitsleistungen und viele weitere Benefits ‚Äì sogar deine Familienangeh√∂rigen profitieren mit!Gesundheitszusch√ºsse: Frei verf√ºgbares Budget f√ºr Massagen, Brillen, Arzneimittel, Heilpraktikerleistungen u.‚ÄØv.‚ÄØm.Ausgezeichnete Lage: Moderne B√ºror√§ume in Alstern√§he mit exzellenter Infrastruktur und Anbindung.Kostenlose Getr√§nke: Kaffee, Limonade, Orangensaft - alles dabei!Private Entlastung: Wir zahlen deinen Weg zur Arbeit, dein Mittagessen, die private Handyrechnung und vieles mehr.
Die Social Selling GmbH ist eine der innovativsten Unternehmensberatungen im Herzen Hamburgs und wurde mit dem "Top Arbeitgeber-Award 2023" von Fairfamily ausgezeichnet.Wir helfen ambitionierten Unternehmen dabei, eine Basis f√ºr zuk√ºnftige Skalierung im Vertrieb zu etablieren - von der Lead-Generierung bis zum Abschluss von Neukunden sind wir dabei nah an den Prozessen dran.Jeder Mitarbeiter bekommt bei uns die Chance, sein Potenzial zu entfalten, sich selbst zu verwirklichen und √ºber sich hinauszuwachsen.Wir suchen Menschen, die mit uns anpacken und wachsen wollen. Ein enger Teamzusammenhalt, Gespr√§che auf Augenh√∂he und das Beste aus jedem Kundencase herausholen sind f√ºr uns extrem wichtig. Wenn du Lust hast, in einer dynamischen und zielorientierten Umgebung zu arbeiten, dann ist Social Selling genau das Richtige f√ºr dich!Wir suchen Pers√∂nlichkeiten, keine Lebensl√§ufe! Damit wir schon einmal einen ersten Eindruck von dir gewinnen k√∂nnen, f√ºlle bitte diesen Pers√∂nlichkeitsfragebogen aus:https://www.16personalities.com/free-personality-testLade dann das Ergebnis dementsprechend als Dokument mit hoch.Wir freuen uns, dich beim Erstgespr√§ch tiefer kennenzulernen.Bis gleich,Sophia und das ganze Social Selling Team

About the job
            
 
MissionAre you passionate about the transformative power of Artificial Intelligence (AI) and eager to lead strategic initiatives? If so, Inetum Consulting invites you to join our dynamic team as an AI Lead Strategy Consultant.At Inetum Consulting, we're on the forefront of AI innovation. We're seeking a visionary leader to collaborate with our customer-facing teams and drive AI initiatives to new heights.As an AI Lead Strategy Consultant, you'll be at the helm of innovation. Your responsibilities will include: Generating innovative business ideas and translating them into MVP/POC and projects.Staying ahead of market evolutions to identify emerging opportunities.Articulating the substantial business value our customers achieve with Inetum's AI solutions.Representing Inetum at professional conferences through engaging presentations and discussions.Collaborating with specialists from diverse disciplines to craft impactful strategies.Assuming a leadership role in delivering assignments that push the boundaries of AI capabilities.
ProfileWe're looking for a candidate who embodies: A holistic approach, blending business acumen with technology expertise.A deep passion for AI and its potential to revolutionize industries.The ability to work seamlessly with our customer-facing teams to identify and develop new opportunities.Strong communication skills, enabling you to convey complex ideas to diverse audiences.A knack for producing thought leadership materials, including blog articles, whitepapers, and videos.An in-depth understanding of the Machine Learning ecosystem and its business applications.Over 10 years of experience in consulting or software & technology.An advanced degree in Statistics, Data Science, Economics, or a related field.Exceptional analytical, critical thinking, and creative problem-solving skills.A keen grasp of the AI ecosystem.Commercial savvy and the ability to build trust with clients through expertise and a customer-centric approach.
OUR OFFER The opportunity to have a meaningful job where you can make a difference.The chance to continuously evolve as a professional, coupled with a variety of training opportunities.Relevant career opportunities to get you where you want to be, with the IT knowledge you need.Inetum-Realdolmen wants you to find a balance between work and private life by offering flexible hours, satellite offices, home working and an informal no-nonsense environment.32 days of annual leave, because life isn‚Äôt all about working.Forget about the miles: we provide you with a company car and a national fuel card.Group insurance and hospitalization insurance, because we care about you.And of course, we also offer a gross salary. One which is optimized from a net perspective for our employees!
Interested? Questions? For more information, contact your recruiter Pino Amico directly via pino.amico@inetum-realdolmen.world OrganizationInetum Realdolmen, a member of the European Inetum Group with approximately 1,950 highly qualified employees, provides strategic, tactical and operational ICT solutions for over 1,000 customers throughout the Benelux. In every cooperation, Realdolmen realizes the potential of people and organizations and strives to keep ICT human. We are driven by technological innovation, but we advance at the speed of your ambition, results-focused and managing fundamental change.Our company motto "New Challenges, New Ideas" reflects this.An employer you really want to work for!Not only is Realdolmen a no-nonsense, solid, stable and experienced company with great in-house knowledge and expertise, but we also put our employees first: every individual receives the attention they need. ‚ÄòHeart for People' is more than just words for us ‚Äì it's one of our very core values.Satellite offices, extensive training opportunities, work-life balance, competence reviews and career opportunities: these are no empty promises for us. Our organization attaches great importance to diversity. We guarantee an objective selection process, whereby candidates are tested and selected solely on the basis of their qualities and skills.With us it's all about you!

About the job
            
 
‚ÄûWir sind ein innovatives und dynamisches Team, das kundenzentrierte Beratung mit einer Can-Do-Mentalit√§t verbindet.‚Äú Wir wollen gemeinsam mit dir zusammen Marketing-Organisationen nachhaltig transformieren.Wie wir das erreichen? About the job
            
 
Your work will be challenging and stimulating with missions widely spread across companies and industries. If you want diverse and independent work that requires dedication and initiative this is the right position for you. As a trusted Senior Consultant in Strategy and Transactions, you will advise our clients into success.The opportunityAs a Senior Consultant in Strategy & Transaction department, you will participate in the financial and commercial due diligence engagements in connection with some of the largest and most exciting M&A deals in the Baltics and beyond, work on the development and review of the business strategy for clients, business and asset valuation projects as well as participate in M&A Lead Advisory, valuation and modeling engagements. You will help clients evaluate structure and execute their most important deals.Your key responsibilities:  Be the key person responsible for the preparation of reports and detailed financial and commercial analysis; Prepare advanced analytics to provide insights into data that supports the decision-making of our clients on their key financial, economic, and operational issues; Think critically, identify issues and propose strategies related to the advice being provided; Take ownership of the delivery of projects within each team.
To qualify for the role you must have:  University degree in Finance / Economics or related area; Ability to conduct a detailed analysis of products markets competitors and customers to identify risks and opportunities; Good understanding of financial and managerial accounting; Excellent analytical, project management, communication, teamwork, and interpersonal skills + be an active and visible person at the transactions, valuations, and business modeling markets, to engage in meaningful discussions with current and potential clients; Strong written and verbal communication and presentation skills in Latvian and English; Strong Excel knowledge and good report-writing skills.
Ideally, you‚Äôll also have:  At least 2 years of experience in supporting clients in transaction-related processes in various financial matters, experience in valuation and business modeling would be considered as an advantage; Relevant professional qualifications (e.g. CFA, ACCA) would be considered as an advantage; Knowledge of other European or Russian languages would be an advantage.
What We Look ForA team player with a high level of ownership, responsibility and with motivation to continually develop personal & technical skills through training, experience, and coaching.What We OfferOur Total Rewards package includes additional health insurance that covers various medical services, additional firm-paid days off, paid days for your studies & development, and other benefits. Plus, we offer:  A collaborative and international environment where everyone works together to create a better working world; Faster than ever growth with support and coaching from some of the most experienced and engaging colleagues; The opportunity to get an EY Tech MBA degree for free, as well as expand your knowledge in internal training programs; Good opportunities for a long-term career in the EY company in Latvia and in EY offices worldwide; Flexible work organization and the possibility to work in a hybrid model (from home and from our office in the city center); Salary 2300 - 2500 EUR gross, depending from your experience; Health insurance from the 1st working day.
If you can demonstrate that you meet the criteria above, please contact us as soon as possible.The exceptional EY experience. It‚Äôs yours to build.Apply now.

About the job

It is the world‚Äôs fifth largest strategy consulting organisation.Our work helps CEOs, business and public sector leaders to ideate, shape and implement strategic solutions to outperform their industries and master the challenges of a rapidly changing economy.Whether it‚Äôs digital transformation, sector convergence and transformation, new market opportunities or financial and operational complexities, EY-Parthenon teams help CEOs and business leaders address their toughest strategic issues.EY-Parthenon has ambitious growth plans around the world, including Malta. About the job
            
 
Als senior management consultant adviseer je onze opdrachtgevers bij complexe verandertrajecten. Denk bijvoorbeeld aan een verbetertraject in ziekenhuis, of een project binnen de ouderenzorg. Maar na het opleveren van het advies is het werk nog niet gedaan. We zijn niet voor niets een veranderbureau! Eigenlijk begint het dan pas: jij zorgt dat het advies wordt omzet in concreet resultaat. Je hebt vanuit je adviesrol een belangrijk rol bij de implementatie. Van het inrichten van processen, het ontwerpen van een nieuwe organisatiestructuur tot het begeleiden van de organisatie bij de verandering. Als management consultant doe je wat nodig is om de opdrachtgever verder te helpen. We ontzorgen en gaan pas weg als het werkt.Als management consultant bij Bisnez adviseer je directies en management op strategisch niveau. Soms doe je dat zelfstandig of in teamverband met collega‚Äôs vanuit Bisnez, maar het kan ook zijn dat je als senior adviseur onderdeel bent van een projectteam van de opdrachtgever.Naast het uitvoeren van opdrachten bij onze opdrachtgevers, ben je gedreven om mee te bouwen aan Bisnez. Als senior management consultant bij Bisnez ben je d√© gesprekspartner van klant en prospect; je gaat aan de slag als sparringpartner op directieniveau voor onze opdrachtgevers. Naast het uitvoeren van opdrachten, breng je ook nieuwe relaties tot stand. Daarvoor schrijf je mee aan goed onderbouwde offertes en rapporten. Vanuit jouw specialisatie in procesmanagement, datamanagement, informatiemanagement, governance of control krijg je bij ons de vrijheid om te ondernemen.Is dit jouw profiel? Een afgeronde WO-opleiding (bijv. bedrijfs-/bestuurskunde, organisatiewetenschappen, informatiemanagement of vergelijkbaar)Minimaal 10 jaar ervaring in het uitvoeren van adviesopdrachten en het begeleiden van implementatietrajecten op strategisch/tactisch niveau bij zorginstellingen Affiniteit met thema‚Äôs gericht op de bedrijfsvoering van organisaties (processen, governance, informatie-/datamanagement, financieel management en control)Toegang tot een goed, eigen netwerkJe weet als geen ander vanuit de inhoud de relatie vorm te gevenJe beschikt over een groot relatienetwerk, bij voorkeur binnen het Bank- en verzekeringswezen, Overheid, Zorg, Energiemarkt, Infrastructuur of UtilitiesJe bent gedreven om het relatiebestand van Bisnez uit te breiden
De volgende eigenschappen vinden wij belangrijk: TeamspelerPrestatie gedrevenEen hunter met oog voor kansenGevoel voor het managen van relatiesResultaatgerichtOndernemendJe beschikt over de ‚Äògun-factor‚Äô dankzij je positieve instelling en hands-on mentaliteitJe neemt van nature snel en soepel de leiding op jeEmotioneel intelligentGevoel voor je omgevingVol overtuigingskrachtDe drive om mee te willen bouwen aan een groeiende, ambitieuze organisatie
Dit is wat wij bieden... Wij hebben een rotsvast vertrouwen in ons aannamebeleid en bieden je bij een match daarom meteen een vast contract aan.Al onze collega‚Äôs krijgen een vast salaris met mooie bonusregeling, inclusief een marktconform pakket aan secundaire arbeidsvoorwaarden zoals leaseauto (en/of reizen met OV), iPhone, laptop, pensioenvoorziening etc.De mogelijkheid om jezelf verder te ontwikkelen, zowel door coaching als verschillende interne en externe opleidingsmogelijkheden.Veel verantwoordelijkheidWerken binnen een hecht team van ambitieuze mensen, van jonge professionals tot ervaren management consultants die uitblinken in hun vak. Allemaal collega‚Äôs die je met raad en daad bijstaan.Een team dat elkaar zowel binnen als buiten werktijd opzoekt, bijvoorbeeld tijdens √©√©n van de door ons georganiseerde teamevents zoals het jaarlijkse weekend weg met alle collega‚Äôs en hun partners, borrels en diners, ski√´n in de Alpen of fietsen in de Elzas.
Meer weten of reageren?Herken jij jezelf in bovenstaande vacature? Spreekt onze verbondenheid en ambitie om opdrachtgevers iedere dag weer het beste van onszelf te geven jou aan, reageer dan op deze vacature. About the job
            
 
#WEARADARAD is a strategic consulting company operating in the field of digital transformation.We help both large international companies and Italian start-ups to create or improve their business through the opportunities offered by digital, supporting them in defining the most appropriate strategy for their operating scenario and following them in its implementation. The sectors in which we operate primarily are retail, grocery, food & beverage and fashion.We are looking for inspired talents,¬†digital enthusiasts who want to grow professionally in a fast and stimulating environment, taking advantage of the opportunity to be directly involved right away on various and complex projects, ranging from strategic to organizational consultancy, from optimization of e-commerce performance to product management, from the set up of digital channels to business development.WHY WORK WITH USAt ARAD we work every day to affirm a new way of consulting: simpler, more efficient, more humane. Even if we are a small team, we manage projects for big brands and every member of the team is actively involved and gains experience daily. One of our core values is the spirit of collaboration, we help each other as we all work for the same goal.We put people first - life can be hard, we actively try to make it easier: for instance, we combined on-premises (either in our Bologna or Milan offices) and remote working before it was cool.We value ideas - all ideas are worth sharing but most importantly hearing, no matter where they come from: we debate (friendly), we choose the path and we all commit.We strive for greatness - we are proud to have both great clients from a wide range of different industries and great talents to push our limits further every day.We grow with you - having a small team means that¬†every new addition has a deep impact¬†on our dynamics and shapes the way to the ARAD of the future.We have fun along the way - we are a cohesive bunch of characters but we are always open to welcoming new friends to the party!WHO YOU WILL BEWe are looking for a talented¬†Digital Business Consultant. As an ARAD Consultant, you will take an active part in the end-to-end management of the consultancy projects, from their initial set-up up to their closure.It will be your responsibility to produce the analyses and outputs, manage the relationship with clients, coordinate all the actors involved (both internal and external), respect time and quality standards and monitor the margins of the assigned projects. We are not hierarchical: we mostly believe in helping each other out to raise to our fullest potential. You will be working with senior colleagues that will actively support you in managing projects, providing their in-depth expertise in the reference area.WHAT YOU WILL DO Analyse and find optimal solutions to complex problems of different nature.Compare and benchmark best practices within or cross-industry for both websites and omnichannel services.Design and assemble presentations to showcase project advancements and outputs.Administer and collect user acceptance testing.Ensure that all projects are delivered on time, and within the scope and budget.Create and maintain comprehensive project documentation.Manage the relations with the client and all stakeholders.Coordinate internal resources and third parties/vendors for the flawless execution of projects.Support in business development activities.
WHAT YOU MUST HAVE Previous experience in a consultancy firm.Excellent level of digital alphabetization and passion (even better if supported by previous job experiences).Ability to collect inputs, rationalise them and transform them into great-quality output respecting project schedule.Ability to work with cross-functional teams.Ability to articulate processes, ideas, and solutions to a team.Orientation towards providing and receiving constructive feedback.Experience in testing usability and accessibility concerns.Excellent client-facing and internal communication skills, written and verbal communication skills.Solid organizational skills, including attention to detail and multi-tasking skills.Strong working knowledge of productivity tools (presentation and spreadsheet mainly) and good aesthetic sense.Fluency in both English and Italian.Willingness to learn a new thing every day.

About the job
            
 
Roles & ResponsibilitiesYou will be working on client projects which can involve different areas of Business Transformation (BT) competences depending on the client‚Äôs main business challenges. These can range from business transformations, streamlining of operating processes, cost optimizations, digitalization, new technologies, improving customer experience, organizational changes, etc.Business Transformation (BT) competences include mainly (but are not limited to): Business strategyOrganization design and target operating modelOperational Excellence, specifically process design & optimizationPeople & Change, ensuring cultural and behavioral change and embedding change within organizations as well as optimizing the HR function and the human capital via future-proof talent management strategies and processes;Customer, Sales, Marketing and Services advisory, including value proposition definition, customer journey mapping and analysis, customer process improvements and transformationProject and portfolio management
You will thus be an active participant of the long-term goal of Business Tranformation (BT) by assisting clients in their business challenges and by bringing sustainable added value to the company as a whole. In addition to your role within project teams, you will also be involved in supporting business development activities such as proposal writing for new client demands.Your role will be highly varied and involves working in a supportive, young and dynamic team. The range of clients, and the projects you could work on, offers continuous challenge and a constantly shifting workload.You'll be in regular contact with clients, requiring travel many client sites on a national and international basis.Skills & QualificationsWe are looking for people who will soon hold a master degree in Economics (applied economics, business administration...), Commercial/Civil Engineering, Psychology, Social Sciences, Law... or an equivalent.Besides a strong technical basis, we are looking for people who: Have a working knowledge of French or Dutch (mother tongue/bilingual) and English;Like to work in a project based working environment;Take responsibility to deliver high-quality service;Foster innovation;Build collaborative relationships;Seek feedback and motivate others;Create an environment in which all team members feel like they belong;Communicate transparently and with impact;Are proactive and can demonstrate a ‚Äúcan-do‚Äù attitude;Are constructive and solution oriented;Have an analytical mindset;Can demonstrate integrity by being reliable and dependable;Can work independently and in a team;Are flexible and can adapt their organization (remote work, one-site‚Ä¶) according to circumstances and needs (client needs‚Ä¶).
We offerAt KPMG, we commit ourselves to encouraging true team spirit and creating an international and dynamic working environment in which each can pursue the knowledge needed to boost their career. Additionally, we highly invest in our people‚Äôs development of soft skills and technical knowhow.We also offer: An inclusive workspace that encourages diversity and pursues mutual respect and tolerance for each other‚Äôs beliefs and background.A competitive and attractive compensation package with extra legal advantages (mobility budget or lease car, laptop, IPhone/IPad device, insurance package‚Ä¶)A flexible, hybrid working schedule where employees can work on different locations: at home, at the office, on the go or at a client‚Äôs site.A wide range of teambuilding activities and social events (e.g. afterwork drinks, network evenings, annual national receptions, etc.) that enable new joiners to meet colleagues within the wider KPMG community and have some fun along the way.A comprehensive well-being programme that includes hospitalization insurance and several initiatives that focus on mental health.

About the job
            
 
Do you agree that today's social and environmental challenges can only be met through the smart use of digital technologies? Are you ready for this future and are you looking for an innovative, agile working environment in the e-commerce sector where you can have an impact on champions and hidden champions? Then you have come to the right place! Become a pioneer of digital transformation and support our team!What you can expect You, embedded in our project teams, will be responsible for supporting the managers of well-known customers from a wide range of industries in the digitization of their core business.You will take on responsibility for (sub-)projects, specialist topics and people, depending on your experience.You will transfer current technology trends into new business ideas and derive sustainable business models and strategies.Through customer, competition and best-practice analyses, you will create a solid basis for decision-making and you will integrate knowledge and experience carriers on the customer side in innovative workshop formats into the design of results.
This is what you bring along An above-average master degree, ideally with a focus on Business, Engineering or IT.[Mandatory requirement] Relevant professional experience of at least two years in Strategy Consulting in an established management consultancy.Solid experience and enthusiasm in several of the following topics: Digital Business Models, Corporate Strategy, Change Management, Transformation Management.Strong analytical skills, structured thinking and result orientation as well as initial leadership experience and convincing presentation skills.Excellent communication skills in English (C1-level). German and Portuguese are a strong advantage.

About the job
            
 
The Strategy and Transactions (SaT) team of EY Cyprus is looking to recruit Senior consultants to work with a high-performing, integrated team which focuses on transactions, providing advice in challenging and interesting projects. We are offering the opportunity to gain a diverse range of experiences and develop a great sense of achievement.About Strategy And TransactionsThe Strategy and Transactions team guides clients to make better, more informed decisions as they buy, sell, separate, integrate, reshape, restructure or rethink their business strategy. We help our clients by providing advice on all aspects of transactions, from inception to execution and completion.Being one of the fastest growing and reputable teams in Cyprus, we remain at the forefront of all major transactions in the island, covering numerous market sectors.Strategy and Transactions offers a wide variety of services. The key competencies include, among others, the below: Lead advisory (M&A)Transaction DiligenceValuations, Modelling & EconomicsRestructuringStrategyBanking transaction advisory servicesReal Estate transaction advisory services
Key responsibilities of the role: Understand, analyse and present a client‚Äôs existing/proposed business, identify key strengths and weaknesses and document key findings;Understand key business drivers in a transaction and provide value to the client through insights, factual conclusions and advice;Document main findings that underpin the advice that we provide our clients with;Gather, verify and assess information and formulate views;Plan, prepare and review deliverables in various forms including written reports, presentations and discussions with the client;Assist with proposal preparations for prospective clients;Build on and develop internal and external networks through personal contacts;Build strong internal relationships with members of the SaT team and other EY services;Take responsibility for your own learning and development;Provide coaching / support to other team members.
To qualify for the role you must have: Qualified or in an advanced process of becoming qualified ACA, ACCA, CFA or equivalent professional qualification (e.g. MBA) will be considered an advantageStrong academic record, preferably relating to Accounting, Economics, Finance, Engineering, Physics or MathematicsAdvanced business writing and verbal communication skills both in Greek and EnglishSound financial modelling skillsStrong presentation skillsAbility to work under strict deadlinesStrong analytical, organizational, problem solving and critical thinking skillsEffective written and verbal communication
Ideally, you will also have: Experience in a similar transaction advisory environment / teamData analytics skills (through use of analytics tools and/or a programming language)Skills and attributes for success:Energetic, positive and team player;Strong analytical, interpersonal and communication skills;Flexible with a can-do attitude and a strong eye for detail;Thirsty for learning and development.
What Working At EY OffersEY offers an attractive remuneration package for rewarding both personal and team performance. We are committed to be an inclusive employer and are happy to consider flexible working arrangements. In addition, but not limited to our benefits include: Flexible working arrangements (work from anywhere when possible and flexible work schedule)Friday afternoon offEY Tech MBA and EY Master‚Äôs in business AnalyticsEY Badges - digital credentialsMobility programs (if interested to work abroad)Private Medical and Life InsurancePaid Sick LeavePaid Paternity LeaveMaternity, Wedding and New Baby GiftsDress for the OccasionEY Employee Assistance Program (EAP) (counselling, legal and financial consultation services).
About EYEY | Building a better working world EY exists to build a better working world, helping to create long-term value for clients, people and society and build trust in the capital markets.Enabled by data and technology, diverse EY teams in over 150 countries provide trust through assurance and help clients grow, transform, and operate.Working across Assurance, Consulting, Tax, Strategy, and Transactions, EY teams ask better questions to find new answers for the complex issues facing our world today.#betterworkingworldIf you can demonstrate that you meet the criteria above, please contact us as soon as possible.The Exceptional EY Experience. It‚Äôs Yours To Build.Apply Now.

About the job

About the job
            
 
Alkemy √® una societ√† internazionale specializzata nell‚Äôevoluzione del modello di business di grandi e medie aziende e una public company quotata sul mercato MTA STAR di Borsa Italiana.La nostra mission √® di migliorare la posizione di mercato e la competitivit√† delle grandi e medie aziende stimolando l‚Äôevoluzione del modello di business in coerenza con l‚Äôinnovazione tecnologica e i comportamenti dei consumatori. Grazie a un team di pi√π di 1000 persone, integriamo competenze nelle aree di Strategy, Communication, Design, Performance, Technology, Insights & Analytics con un‚Äôofferta, pensata per il contesto post-digital, che copre l‚Äôintera catena del valore dalla strategia all‚Äôimplementazione.IL RUOLOPer il potenziamento del team di Strategy Consulting, Alkemy √® alla ricerca di profili da inserire con il ruolo di Strategy Consultant (2/4 anni di esperienza).Le risorse verranno inserite a supporto del team Consulting, dedicato ad aiutare i business leader nell‚Äôimpostazione strategica di percorsi di trasformazione digitale e di innovazione per le loro aziende. Il team Strategy supporta quotidianamente i propri clienti a coniugare una profonda comprensione delle dinamiche di business delle diverse industry, con temi a forte contenuto innovativo in ambito Customer Experience, Big Data, Industry 4.0, Open Innovation, Omnichannel Strategy in modo da massimizzare l‚Äôimpatto sull‚Äôattuale business model e garantirne un‚Äôevoluzione in grado di cogliere le opportunit√† di medio/lungo periodo. Nei nostri progetti valorizziamo competenze di business trasversali, specifiche conoscenze funzionali e discipline digitali.Sede di lavoro: MilanoEsperienza: 2/4 anni in primarie societ√† di consulenzaArea: ConsultingKEY REQUIREMENTSValutiamo giovani talenti con la passione per il digitale e l‚Äôinnovazione.Sono per noi requisiti fondamentali:¬∑ Esperienza pregressa in primarie societ√† di consulenza ¬∑ Motivazione a lavorare in un ambiente dinamico ed in continua evoluzione¬∑ Attitudine alla gestione di progetti complessi, autonomia e lavorare con orientamento alla performance¬∑ Capacit√† di pensare in modo analitico e critico per affrontare nuove sfide e trovare soluzioni promuovendo l‚Äôinnovazione ed un lavoro orientato alle performance¬∑ Spiccata propensione al lavoro di team¬∑ Ottima padronanza dell‚Äôinglese¬∑ Laurea magistrale in materie economiche o scientifiche COSA OFFRIAMOIn Alkemy ci impegniamo costantemente nel creare le migliori condizioni affinch√© tutte le nostre persone sentano di poter esprimere al meglio il proprio valore ed il proprio talento - e possano sentire Alkemy come casa propria - indipendentemente da genere, et√†, nazionalit√†, orientamento sessuale e religioso.Siamo da sempre profondamente convinti che un ambiente di lavoro inclusivo che valorizzi tutte le diversit√† sia non solo un imperativo valoriale, ma un fattore critico di successo per il nostro business. Aggreghiamo sotto lo stesso tetto persone con professionalit√† e background molto diversi e da sempre promuoviamo una cultura di condivisione e crescita continua.Eccellenza, Passione, Integrit√† e Concretezza sono i valori fondanti di Alkemy, che tutti noi condividiamo e che ci guidano nel realizzare la nostra mission. I valori Alkemy definiscono la nostra identit√† e sono alla base della nostra cultura organizzativa, indirizzano i nostri comportamenti nei confronti di tutte le nostre persone e dei nostri clienti, costruendo evolutivamente il nostro approccio al business.I profili ritenuti in linea verranno contattati entro 20 giorni. job_description:
About the job
            
 
DescriptionRejoignez le leader du conseil en Strat√©gie Data et IA !Qui sommes-nous ?Cabinet de conseil en Strat√©gie Data et Intelligence Artificielle (IA), AI Builders a √©t√© fond√© en 2019 par St√©phane RODER, auteur du Guide Pratique de l‚ÄôIntelligence Artificielle dans l‚Äôentreprise, autour de trois valeurs : Expertise, Bienveillance et Excellence.Depuis, le cabinet connait une croissance exponentielle avec aujourd‚Äôhui 40 collaborateurs et un chiffre d‚Äôaffaire qui double tous les ans.Fort de son expertise, AI Builders rencontre un vrai succ√®s aupr√®s de grands groupes du CAC 40 et du SBF120 et, dans la d√©finition et le d√©ploiement de leur Strat√©gie Data IA.Pourquoi ?Dans un monde ultra comp√©titif, l‚Äôaugmentation de la performance et la cr√©ation de valeur sont au c≈ìur des pr√©occupations des entreprises.En effet, l'IA change la physionomie des entreprises, transforme des processus entiers, change leurs mod√®les de co√ªts op√©rationnels et permet de cr√©er de nouveaux produits et services.La Data et l‚ÄôIA permettent de :  Changer la structure de co√ªts des entreprises Cr√©er de nouveaux produits et services R√©pondre aux enjeux et objectifs strat√©giques des entreprises √† court et long terme
Comment ?Une exp√©rience in√©dite sur le march√© !  Des consultants disposant d‚Äôune double comp√©tence : Strat√©gie et Data IA Une m√©thodologie et un savoir-faire uniques d√©velopp√©s en interne AI Builders Research, cabinet d‚Äôanalyses internes √† destination de nos clients et nos consultants
Pourquoi AI Builders ?Nous rejoindre, c‚Äôest :  Rejoindre le leader du conseil en strat√©gie Data et IA ; Participer aux projets industriels Data IA les plus passionnants, challengeants et novateurs ; Travailler en √©troite collaboration avec les Directions G√©n√©rales et les Chief Data Officers de grands groupes ; B√©n√©ficier de AI Builders University, plateforme con√ßue en interne par des consultants et pour des consultants ; Int√©grer la dimension Data et IA dans vos recommandations strat√©giques ; Profiter de l‚Äôexp√©rience capitalis√©e dans tous les secteurs d‚Äôactivit√© et √† tous les niveaux de maturit√©

About the job
            
 
Als senior management consultant adviseer je onze opdrachtgevers bij complexe verandertrajecten. Denk bijvoorbeeld aan het inrichten van data governance binnen een financi√´le instelling, of adviseer je een overheidsinstelling rondom data gedreven werken.Maar na het opleveren van het advies is het werk nog niet gedaan. We zijn niet voor niets een veranderbureau! Eigenlijk begint het dan pas: jij zorgt dat het advies wordt omzet in concreet resultaat. Je hebt vanuit je adviesrol een belangrijk rol bij de implementatie. Van het inrichten van processen, het ontwerpen van een nieuwe organisatiestructuur tot het begeleiden van de organisatie bij de verandering. Als management consultant doe je wat nodig is om de opdrachtgever verder te helpen. We ontzorgen en gaan pas weg als het werkt.Als management consultant bij Bisnez adviseer je directies en management op strategisch niveau. Soms doe je dat zelfstandig of in teamverband met collega‚Äôs vanuit Bisnez, maar het kan ook zijn dat je als senior adviseur onderdeel bent van een projectteam van de opdrachtgever.Naast het uitvoeren van opdrachten bij onze opdrachtgevers, ben je gedreven om mee te bouwen aan Bisnez. Als senior management consultant bij Bisnez ben je d√© gesprekspartner van klant en prospect; je gaat aan de slag als sparringpartner op directieniveau voor onze opdrachtgevers. Naast het uitvoeren van opdrachten, breng je ook nieuwe relaties tot stand. Daarvoor schrijf je mee aan goed onderbouwde offertes en rapporten. Vanuit jouw specialisatie in procesmanagement, datamanagement, informatiemanagement, governance of control krijg je bij ons de vrijheid om te ondernemen.Is dit jouw profiel? Een afgeronde WO-opleiding (bijv. bedrijfs-/bestuurskunde, organisatiewetenschappen, informatiemanagement of vergelijkbaar)Minimaal 10 jaar ervaring in het uitvoeren van adviesopdrachten en het begeleiden van implementatietrajecten op strategisch/tactisch niveau in de publieke sector (gemeenten, Rijksoverheid, zorginstellingen, onderwijs etc.), financi√´le instellingen (bank- en verzekeringswezen) en/of corporates.Affiniteit met thema‚Äôs gericht op de bedrijfsvoering van organisaties (processen, governance, informatie-/datamanagement, financieel management en control)Toegang tot een goed, eigen netwerkJe weet als geen ander vanuit de inhoud de relatie vorm te gevenJe beschikt over een groot relatienetwerk, bij voorkeur binnen het Bank- en verzekeringswezen, Overheid, Zorg, Energiemarkt, Infrastructuur of UtilitiesJe bent gedreven om het relatiebestand van Bisnez uit te breiden
De volgende eigenschappen vinden wij belangrijk: TeamspelerPrestatie gedrevenEen hunter met oog voor kansenGevoel voor het managen van relatiesResultaatgerichtOndernemendJe beschikt over de ‚Äògun-factor‚Äô dankzij je positieve instelling en hands-on mentaliteitJe neemt van nature snel en soepel de leiding op jeEmotioneel intelligentGevoel voor je omgevingVol overtuigingskrachtDe drive om mee te willen bouwen aan een groeiende, ambitieuze organisatie
Dit is wat wij bieden... Wij hebben een rotsvast vertrouwen in ons aannamebeleid en bieden je bij een match daarom meteen een vast contract aan.Al onze collega‚Äôs krijgen een vast salaris met mooie bonusregeling, inclusief een marktconform pakket aan secundaire arbeidsvoorwaarden zoals leaseauto (en/of reizen met OV), iPhone, laptop, pensioenvoorziening etc.De mogelijkheid om jezelf verder te ontwikkelen, zowel door coaching als verschillende interne en externe opleidingsmogelijkheden.Veel verantwoordelijkheidWerken binnen een hecht team van ambitieuze mensen, van jonge professionals tot ervaren management consultants die uitblinken in hun vak. Allemaal collega‚Äôs die je met raad en daad bijstaan.Een team dat elkaar zowel binnen als buiten werktijd opzoekt, bijvoorbeeld tijdens √©√©n van de door ons georganiseerde teamevents zoals het jaarlijkse weekend weg met alle collega‚Äôs en hun partners, borrels en diners, ski√´n in de Alpen of fietsen in de Elzas.
Meer weten of reageren?Herken jij jezelf in bovenstaande vacature? Spreekt onze verbondenheid en ambitie om opdrachtgevers iedere dag weer het beste van onszelf te geven jou aan, reageer dan op deze vacature. Wij werken alleen met vaste contracten, niet met ZZP- constructies. Heb je nog vragen, neem contact op met Annette Kramer en Janet Husen via solliciteren@bisnez.com.

About the job
            
 
You must have valid Irish, UK, or EU work rights to be considered for this roleLocation: Cherrywood, Dublin 22 with hybrid workingAbout the TeamWe are seeking a Strategy and Innovation Consultant to join the Aviva Life & Pensions Ireland (ALPI) Strategy teamThis is an excellent opportunity for a highly motivated, curious and innovative individual who has a strong understanding of the Life & Pensions industry or financial services strategy formulation, accomplished in-house or strategy consulting. Reporting to the Head of Strategy and Product Governance, you will support ALPI‚Äôs expansive growth strategy, developing innovative initiatives which meet true customer needs. If not coming from a specifically strategic background this position may suit you if you're coming from a commercial background in the industry, or a customer needs analysis or propositions background. This position will have exposure to our UK organisation as we build out our competitive intelligence hub.You will build ALPI‚Äôs competitive intelligence hub, developing a detailed understanding of both local and select international market landscapes, industry mega-trends, product and distribution developments, as well as other key areas such as regulatory change, consumer behavioural trends, and the M&A landscape in Ireland.As part of your role, you‚Äôll forge positive relationships with the wider team across the ALPI and the Aviva Group. We‚Äôre looking for someone with excellent communication and stakeholder management skills, whose personal impact enables them to challenge and positively influence at all levels. You‚Äôll support with defining our strategy and strategic objectives and being a trusted adviser to key functions across the Life business including CEO Office, Commercial, Operational and Finance Executives and support them to develop their respective functional strategies.You‚Äôll also work closely with ALPI‚Äôs Transformation function, supporting the development of compelling investment initiatives, project planning and ongoing support for of a range of high impact strategic programmes.Duties and Responsibilities: Focus on bringing data driven insights into ALPI's strategy development process, and lead on strategic analysis & reporting.Collaborate with the Product, Pricing & Marketing function to build innovative customer led initiatives which deliver compelling benefits for our customers and shareholders.Lead presentations and collaborative workshops with a range audiences across the company to build and test strategic hypothesis.Support the delivery of a variety of high-impact projects, demonstrating strong analytical / project management skills.Manage strategic reporting for Ireland Life Executive Committee, ALPIDAC Board and Aviva Group where required.Develop relationships with Aviva Group counterparts, and build an in depth understanding of strategic priorities of other Aviva business units to create opportunities to partner with a "One Aviva" approach.Support the development and growth of our business, and actively engage with delivery of pitches and presentations to internal and external stakeholders where required.Analyse and develop deep insights on business performance, core performance metrics, and support in preparation of business performance reviews.
Skills and experience we‚Äôre looking for: A problem-solver with strong commercial skills, coupled with excellent project management / facilitation ability.Excellent written communication and presentation skills, including advanced skills in MS Office packages (particularly PowerPoint).Ability to navigate and summarise complicated topics into clear, concise, and compelling messages across various audiences (e.g., colleagues, Executive Committee, Boards).A resilient individual, with strong ability to influence and communicate across the business.Self-motivated, with an ability to use independent judgment, prioritise, handle multiple issues and challenges and adapt to changing demands.Life & Pensions market experience preferable, but wider Financial Services experience also considered.Degree or equivalent professional experience.
What will you get for this role?  A competitive market leading salary depending on skills, experience, and qualificationsGenerous pension (employee contribution matching of up to 14% if you contribute 8%)Annual performance related bonus and pay reviewHoliday allowance of 29 days plus bank holidays, and the option to buy/sell up to 5 additional daysFree car parkingGenerous Health & dental insurance contributions after six monthsAviva Matching Share Plan and Save As You Earn scheme and Approved Profit Share SchemeCycle to Work benefit schemeTaxSaver Travel SchemeFamily friendly parent‚Äôs (matching paternity and maternity leave) and carer‚Äôs leave.Up to 40% discount for some Aviva products plus discounts for Friends and FamilyEmployee Assistance ProgrammeVolunteering daysProfessional qualification support and transparent career progression plans
Aviva is for Everyone Our diversity and inclusion policies and initiatives are shaping an environment where everyone feels welcome regardless of age, disability, race, ethnicity, gender, gender identity, religion, culture, sexual orientation, national origin, marital status, pregnancy, maternity or those with other caring responsibilities. Our approach helps to ensure that Aviva is a place which values difference and provides equal opportunities for all.We flex locations, hours and working patterns to suit our customers, business, and you.Our smart working combines the benefits of flexibility with time together with colleagues.We prefer all applications to be submitted online, however if you require an alternative method of applying, please contact sophie.keely@aviva.com or at 086 1584943.

If you want to help top e-commerce businesses boost their performance, serve clients and get experience globally and have immediate, tangible results, join our Professional Services team as a Business Consultant. Your salary starts at 2 200‚Ç¨ per month, along with stock options and other benefits. You might work in one of our Central European offices or from home on a full-time basis.Tasks and responsibilities: As a business consultant you will be responsible for delivering value to Bloomreach‚Äôs clients through the deployment and use of our Engagement PlatformYou will be supporting clients in the implementation phase with business requirements gathering, preparation of the data structure, data migration process and automated programes deploymentYou will be a key advisor for clients regarding e -commerce, analytics, data management, digital marketing, marketing automation and emailing + mobile technologiesYou will be responsible for building strong relationships with clients by bringing continuous improvement to their business, maximising utilization of the platform and improving their KPIs/ROI In a collaboration with Customer Success Manager you will be responsible for developing business strategy and a roadmap with clients as well as aligning with them on relevant business goals and critical metricsOn top of the overall knowledge, you will become an expert in chosen part of the platform in order to lead and advise clients and internal stakeholders in a given topic of expertiseYou will play a pivotal role in clients‚Äô onboarding, platform adoption and product features utilizationYou will be collaborating with various internal teams to build services focused around the product and contribute for internal process improvementYou will be supporting our US based clients working US hours: 3 pm - 12 am
What we expect of the candidate: Ideally 2-3 years of experience in a consulting role within a SaaS environmentWorking knowledge of at least one of email, sms, social ads in the marketplace, etc.Experience in the following sectors/fields: online analytics, performance marketing, marketing automation, data science, A/B testing, personalisation, campaign optimisation, customer lifetime value, e-mailing automation, reactivation, attribution modelling, prediction, product recommendations, e-commerceKnowledge of ecommerce business and business trends, and the ability to understand clients‚Äô business models and adapt consulting approach accordinglyExcellent consulting skills: clear written and verbal communication, presentation skills, confidence in dealing with business users and stakeholders at all levels of seniority, exceptional organizational skills, proactive problem solving skillsAbility to handle difficult situations in a proactive, goal-oriented, and highly professional wayProactively maintain the highest level of expertise by deepening your knowledge of the Bloomreach Engagement platform and solutions through internally and externally available learning opportunities, as well as self-studyNative or professional fluency in English.
More things you'll like about Bloomreach:Culture: A great deal of freedom and trust. At Bloomreach we don‚Äôt clock in and out, and we have neither corporate rules nor long approval processes. This freedom goes hand in hand with responsibility. We are interested in results from day one. We have defined our 5 values and the 10 underlying key behaviors that we strongly believe in. We can only succeed if everyone lives these behaviors day to day. We've embedded them in our processes like recruitment, onboarding, feedback, personal development, performance review and internal communication. We believe in flexible working hours to accommodate your working style. We work remote-first with several Bloomreach Hubs available across three continents. We organize company events to experience the global spirit of the company and get excited about what's ahead. We encourage and support our employees to engage in volunteering activities - every Bloomreacher can take 5 paid days off to volunteer*.The Bloomreach Glassdoor page elaborates on our stellar 4.6/5 rating. The Bloomreach Comparably page Culture score is even higher at 4.9/5 
Personal Development: We have a People Development Program -- participating in personal development workshops on various topics run by experts from inside the company. We are continuously developing & updating competency maps for select functions. Our resident communication coach Ivo Veƒçe≈ôa is available to help navigate work-related communications & decision-making challenges.*Our managers are strongly encouraged to participate in the Leader Development Program to develop in the areas we consider essential for any leader. The program includes regular comprehensive feedback, consultations with a coach and follow-up check-ins. Bloomreachers utilize the $1,500 professional education budget on an annual basis to purchase education products (books, courses, certifications, etc.)* 
Well-being: The Employee Assistance Program -- with counselors -- is available for non-work-related challenges.* Subscription to Calm - sleep and meditation app.* We organize ‚ÄòDisConnect‚Äô days where Bloomreachers globally enjoy one additional day off each quarter, allowing us to unwind together and focus on activities away from the screen with our loved ones. We facilitate sports, yoga, and meditation opportunities for each other. 
Compensation: Restricted Stock Units or Stock Options are granted depending on a team member‚Äôs role, seniority, and location.* Everyone gets to participate in the company's success through the company performance bonus.* We offer an employee referral bonus of up to $3,000 paid out immediately after the new hire starts. We celebrate work anniversaries -- Bloomversaries!* 
(*Subject to employment type. Interns are exempt from marked benefits, usually for the first 6 months.)If this position doesn't suit you, but you know someone who might be a great fit, share it - we will be very grateful!Any unsolicited resumes/candidate profiles submitted through our website or to personal email accounts of employees of Bloomreach are considered property of Bloomreach and are not subject to payment of agency fees.
