About the job
            
 
We are currently seeking a Strategy Consultant ESG at all levels to join our team. Candidates ideally have previous experience of working as a Strategy Consultant ESG in some capacity for, or at large organisations, on digital transformation initiatives.Your roleThis position is within the Benelux team, which focusses on providing advice and guidance to customers on IT Strategy, Enterprise Architecture, and Solution Architecture.As an Strategy Consultant ESG, you will deliver value and excellence to our customers through key project engagements, and you will also support the growth of the Technology Modernization Consulting practice. Our services focus on the agendas of the Chief Information Officer (CIO), the Chief Technology Officer (CTO) and/or product/platform owners, on mainly Digital & Emerging Technologies and Technology Transformation.Responsibilities:  Shape, contribute, and deliver value through advisory consultancy, and transformational delivery engagements Connect and collaborate with teams across our business in the development and presentation of proposals to clients Work with account teams to support opportunity identification, qualification, and sales Develop a cross practice understanding of service offerings to ensure effective consultative selling Use your personal contacts and networking skills to help grow our consulting pipeline You are able to develop client ready ESG strategy support Contribute to the development of a knowledge management led approach ensuring the development of reusable collateral from assignments Team building: promote empowerment of the team, ensure that each team member is fully engaged in their projects and our team, making meaningful contributions, and encourage a sustainable pace with high levels of quality for the team
Your Team:The Technology Modernization Consulting practice at Cognizant helps clients to reimagine, redefine, and transform their businesses through technology. We bring unparalleled levels of insight, innovation, and delivery velocity to help our clients become digital leaders and enable them to create disruption within their industry. We do this by employing the best people in the industry, working with a single-minded focus and a pragmatic, hands-on approach to delivering technology strategy and solutions.What We Offer:  A fair salary based on your qualities and experience Access to Udemy, Cognizant Academy digital libraries for your continuous learning NS business card to cover your commute expenses. 25 days of paid holiday per year A laptop and a smartphone A pension scheme Health insurance Organization driven by technology ‚Äì we have a tremendous technology backbone Open, ‚Äòcan do‚Äô team spirit and international environment that encourages making your ideas reality! 32-40 hour working week Possibility to work 2-3 days a week remotely
What You Will Bring To The Team:  Experience or expertise in any of the following areas: IT Strategy Development, Sustainability Development, ESG Consultant, CSRD Specialist, IT Operating Model design, IT Portfolio Management, or Merger & Acquisition Services Previous experience in an IT Strategy Advisory or Technology Consulting role is preferred Experience of working across multiple industry sectors (preferred) Strong stakeholder management and relationship building skills at senior levels that will enable consensus building and shaping technology direction Very strong inquisitive and critical thinking skills, communication and presentation skills, and a relationship builder with the ability to convince Energetic and free thinking; open to lead and coach, and be coached
About CognizantCognizant is one of the world‚Äôs leading professional services companies, transforming clients‚Äô business, operating and technology models for the digital era. Our unique industry-based, consultative approach helps clients envision, build and run more innovative and efficient businesses. Headquartered in the U.S., Cognizant, a member of the NASDAQ-100, ranked in the Fortune 500 and consistently listed among the most admired companies in the world.Diversity And Inclusion At Cognizant:At Cognizant, we believe diversity and inclusion are at the heart of our ability to execute successfully and consistently over the long term. We recognize that our people are our most important asset. We strive to create an environment where all associates feel comfortable to be themselves, feel accepted and can therefore thrive both personally and professionally. We continue to drive D&I throughout our organization to unlock the insights, imagination and innovation of our associates, as well as reflect the diversity of our clients and communities. We are a Dutch and European Top Employer and continually drive employment recognition and engagement through employee friendly policies and affinity groups such as ‚ÄúWomen Empowered‚Äù, ‚ÄúEmbrace LGBTQ+‚Äù and ‚ÄúRace Equality Network‚Äù. For more information, see https://careers.cognizant.com/global/en/diversity-and-inclusionDescription Of The Recruitment Process:Step 1: Written application/CV will be reviewed by the recruitment teamStep 2: Conversation with the recruiterStep 3: Technical interview with the teamStep 4: Business interview with the teamStep 5: OfferRecruiter contact detailsName: Quessia RajohanesaEmail address: quessia.rajohanesa@cognizant.comPhone: +31 6 11 38 45 44Employee Status : Full Time EmployeeShift : Day JobJob Posting : Oct 18 2023About CognizantCognizant (Nasdaq-100: CTSH) is one of the world's leading professional services companies, transforming clients' business, operating and technology models for the digital era. Our unique industry-based, consultative approach helps clients envision, build and run more innovative and efficient businesses. Learn how Cognizant helps clients lead with digital at www.cognizant.com or follow us @Cognizant.

job_title: S&C - Strategy Consultant in Automotive/Mobility or Industrial
job_description:
About the job
            
 
We are looking for passionate, curious and driven team players who are ready to ignite ideas, push boundaries and drive innovation. At Accenture you‚Äôll work on innovative projects and develop your career, collaborating with the best teams in the world. You'll learn, grow and advance in an innovative culture that thrives on shared success, diverse ways of thinking and enables boundaryless opportunities that can drive your career in new and exciting ways. About AccentureAccenture is a leading global professional services company, providing a broad range of services at scale in strategy and consulting, interactive, technology and operations, with digital capabilities across all off these services.We combine unmatched experience and specialized capabilities across more than 40 industries ‚Äì powered by the world‚Äôs largest network of Advanced Technology and Intelligent Operations centers. With 513,000 people serving clients in more than 120 countries, Accenture brings continuous innovation to help clients improve their performance and create lasting value across their enterprises. Working closely with clients our Strategy & Consulting professionals help transform the world‚Äôs leading organizations, working across the C-suite to capitalize innovation.Role & Key AccountabilitiesTake part to strategic projects to ensure their success and maximize business impactAct as the nexus between analysts of the project team and the leadership involved in the deliveryManage, train and contribute to the development of the junior profiles within the teamRequirements3-5 years experience in consulting or project management in a fast-paced environmentTop Business or Engineering SchoolPreferred SkillsStrategy Consulting Experience in Automotive, Mobility and IndustrialAbility to execute projects and bring innovation to our clientsResults-driven, strong analytics mindset.Problem solver, process oriented, ability to foster team spirit and performanceExcellent written and oral communication skills with ability to clearly communicate ideas and results on all organization levelsDrive, ambition and initiative to help grow Accenture¬¥s business at functional and Industry levelPeople development and team building skillsFluent in Spanish and English is mandatoryWhat You Will Get From UsPermanent contract with competitive salary.Great benefits such as a health insurance with 90% premium covered, life insurance and Flexible Salary.Referral Bonus if you reference professional colleagues.Flexible working hours with intensive workdays for two months and a half in summer. Different formats for family reconciliation.English trainings, conferences and certifications.Accenture Privilege (a lot of discounts in several products such as traveling, banking, IT products and restaurants).GymPass.Free coffee and fresh fruit in the office.You can be a part of our LGTBY Ally employees‚Äô group.Accenture is an equal opportunities employer and welcomes applications from all sections of society and does not discriminate on grounds of race, religion or belief, ethnic or national origin, disability, age, citizenship, marital, domestic or civil partnership status, sexual orientation, or gender identity, or any other basis as protected by applicable law.

About the job
            
 
Location: London | Munich | Sao Paolo | Amsterdam | GlobalPositionWe are now expanding our incredibly diverse & talented pool of independent consultants as we continue our global system-change mission.We‚Äôre hiring at all levels, from Associate to Director level equivalents to work on mission driven & pure play impact focused projects that have a substantial, lasting effect on the world we live in.About SystemiqSystemiq, the systems change company and certified B Corp, was founded to drive the achievement of the UN Sustainable Development Goals and the Paris Agreement on climate change by transforming markets and business models in five key systems: nature and food, materials, and circular economy, energy, urban areas, and sustainable finance.We are guided by the conviction that all system transformations are rooted in human transformations. We must continue to bring more diverse people and voices into real conversations to succeed. We know we don‚Äôt have all the answers; we may not even have all the right questions. But we know that open mindsets drive change, so relationships, people, and trust are at the heart of everything we do.Why work with Systemiq?Are you ready to further your career whilst actively contributing to a greener, more regenerative & sustainable world? At Systemiq, we're not just a b corp consultancy firm; we're a community of passionate professionals dedicated to creating positive change. Here's why you should consider joining us as an independent consultant.Mission-Driven Global Impact: At Systemiq, you'll be part of global hybrid teams working towards a shared goal ‚Äì a more sustainable and environmentally-conscious future. Every project you work on will have a direct impact on the planet and society. Your work won't just be a job; it will be a mission to leave a positive, lasting legacy.Inclusivity and acceptance: Systemiq Independent consultants are fostered into an inclusive environment where a whole range of diverse individuals are highly valued for their unique perspectives and contributions to commercial and intellectual Systems thinking. We will hold in high regard your experience including everything you have done outside of consulting as well.Flexibility and Accommodation We will encourage you tailor your work arrangements to your specific needs.Collaborative Environment: Our culture is built on collaboration and innovation. You'll be working with a team of experts who are not only committed to making sustainable systems more investible and regenerative, but also eager to share knowledge and ideas. Together, we tackle complex challenges, finding creative solutions which enables positive Systems change.Networking: As part of our independent contractor network, you will connect with influential figures across multiple sectors relating to sustainability and the environment. We regularly collaborate with industry leaders, leading to unique networking opportunities and helping you expand your professional reach.Requirements 2-10 + years professional experience in relevant fields: (advisory/consulting, strategy, thought leadership/research, industry, project management, investment).Where specifically needed for front line Systemiq strategy projects, at least 1-2 of these years would typically be from a top tier strategy consultancy. Typically, BCG, Bain, Mck, and other top management consulting firms.Exceptional problem solving, analytical and structuring skills with high level of comfort & enthusiasm for delivering intuitive presentations of complex data.Intellectual and commercial curiosity with an interest to quickly dive into new topics,Collaborative team player and can-do attitude.Understanding of key concepts and contexts within one or more of the following topic areas of materials and circularity, sustainable finance, urban environment, industry, energy, or agriculture/land use will be a distinct advantage.Evidenced passion for SYSTEMIQ's mission and the sustainability / environment / social enterprise space.Alignment with SYSTEMIQ's values (creativity, challenge, collaborate, change, care).
Other information Please note, due to the high volume of applications we receive we are not able to respond individually to everyone
Diversity & InclusionWe believe that diversity and inclusion are at the heart of system change and the mission we have set ourselves. So we commit ourselves to:¬∑ Embedding diverse and inclusive ways of working from day to day. This includes recruitment, performance management, and people processes and policies.¬∑ Providing a supportive environment. We want people to be themselves and be at their best, regardless of their background, personality, gender, sexual orientation, race, mental health, religion, or other characteristics.¬∑ Enabling a long-term, sustainable approach to work and life more generally. We want to support our people at all stages of their lives ‚Äì as parents or caregivers, through changing life circumstances ‚Äì and to accommodate personal priorities where they matter most

About the job
            
 
EMERTONEmerton is a global high-end strategy consulting firm based in Paris, London, Munich and New York. We support global corporations and fast-growth companies on their high-stake issues with a focus on Technology and Industry. We bring speed and advanced capabilities to our clients in designing and executing innovative strategies.Emerton is the partner of choice of international groups, technology companies and private equity funds. The firm supports the development acceleration, acquisition policy, international expansion, digital transformation and technological implementation of their clients.Emerton is ranked by Vault (2022) among the top 20 consulting firms in Europe and among top 10 for its Diversity and Inclusion policy.JOB DESCRIPTIONIn close contact with clients and partners, and under the guidance of a senior consultant or manager, you conduct interviews, market analysis and corporate performance assessments. You analyze facts and data, and translate them into meaningful insights and recommendations. After an onboarding period with tailor-made trainings, you will immediately put your talent, analytical capabilities and creativity in action within a project team.WHAT WE OFFER- Fast-learning strategy consulting mindset and methods- International, diverse and inclusive environment- Culture of excellence- Strong team bonding- High-impact projects including sustainable development- Strong client exposure- Competitive compensation and benefits- Fast-growth entrepreneurial company offering many opportunitiesWHO WE LOOK FORHigh-potential individuals willing to work in a challenging international environment- Top-tier academic background (top-ranked engineering or business school)- Proven analytical and creative thinking- Sharp problem-solving capabilities- Strong business sense- Excellent oral and written communication skills

About the job
            
 
Who are we? Mantu is an independent international consulting player, founded in 2007. Bringing together expert and complementary brands, Mantu stands out for the breadth of its spectrum, responding to all business transformation challenges. Its activities are divided into four practices: Leadership & Advocacy, Technology, Digital Marketing & Experience, Total Talent Management.A wide range of skills, all serving a single mission: connecting and powering companies with leading teams and technology to succeed faster and sustainably.From its headquarters in Geneva, Switzerland, Mantu relies on a community of 10,000 talented people in more than 60 countries on 5 continents and has a turnover of 810 million euros.Job description Valuement is an international consulting company, part of Mantu Group, operating in 60 countries, with a primary focus on the retail market and now also expanding new industries. Successful candidates will have the opportunity to be part of an international, young and fast growing group with real opportunities for professional development at all levels.We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Consultant with a background in the retail fashion industry. This position is based in Milan and requires 3 years of relevant experience in consulting, preferably within the Retail sector.Key Responsibilities: Project Management: Manage end-to-end consulting project activities, including project scoping, planning, execution, and delivery.Ensure projects are delivered within agreed timelines, budgets, and quality standards.Business Development: Support business development efforts by identifying new opportunities within the retail fashion industry.Participate in client pitches, proposal development, and lead generation activities.Client Relationship Management: Build and maintain strong relationships with clients, acting as a trusted advisor and understanding their unique business needs.Collaborate closely with clients to develop and implement strategic initiatives that align with their goals.Strategic Analysis: Conduct in-depth analysis of the retail fashion market, including market trends, consumer behavior, competitive landscape, and industry best practices.Translate findings into actionable insights and strategic recommendations for clients.Digital innovation: participate in the functional development of IT solutions (workflow, RPA) that can help customers in the digital innovation process.Qualifications and Skills: -Master's degree in Business Administration, Management or a related field.-3 years of experience in strategic consulting, preferably with a focus on the retail fashion industry.-Proven track record of delivering strategic consulting projects, driving tangible results for clients.-Positive approach and ability to work as a team, with experience in manage other people.-Strong communication and presentation skills, with the ability to effectively communicate complex ideas to stakeholders at all levels.-Fluency in English and Italian is required. Additional languages are a plus.What we offer: Permanent contract + commissions and benefits; Real possibility to grow fast into a management role; International environment, Overseas projects to develop and mobility opportunities.

About the job
            
 
Management ConsultantVan ‚Äòfinancial economic crime‚Äô tot ‚Äòdigital transformation‚Äô. En van ‚Äòtarget operating models‚Äô tot ‚Äòpost-merger integration‚Äô trajecten. Onder deze termen schuilt een fascinerende wereld die blijft verrassen. Een wereld waarin er altijd iets nieuws te ontdekken is. Delta Capita helpt banken, verzekeraars, pensioenfondsen en toezichthouders om slim in te spelen op de veranderingen van een financi√´le markt die zich in razend tempo ontwikkelt.Als management consultant begeleid je klanten bij uiteenlopende vraagstukken. Denk aan het realiseren van een effici√´ntere operatie bij een bank, het integreren van bedrijfsonderdelen of de implementatie van een nieuw pensioenstelsel bij een pensioenuitvoerder. Jij stuurt het team aan en bent verantwoordelijk voor een succesvolle oplevering van de opdracht. De casussen zijn uitdagend en de structuren zijn complex. Precies zoals wij het graag hebben.Bij Delta Capita werk je in een hecht team van bevlogen en internationale collega‚Äôs. Collega‚Äôs die het beste van zichzelf √©n van jou vragen. Al onze teamleden krijgen dan ook veel vrijheid en verantwoordelijkheid in de invulling van hun werk. Wij geven je de ruimte om √©cht het verschil te maken.Onze mensen vormen de kracht van Delta Capita. De talenten, toewijding en passie van ons hele team bepalen het succes van onze organisatie. Daarom zorgen wij graag goed voor al onze collega‚Äôs. We willen een werkplek bieden waarin verschillen gevierd worden en iedereen zich thuis voelt. Een plek waar jij alle mogelijkheden hebt om je volledige potentieel te verkennen en realiseren. We werken hard, maar maken ook tijd voor gezelligheid met borrels, prikkelende teamactiviteiten en legendarische teamuitjes.Haal het beste uit jezelf bij Delta CapitaLeren, ontwikkelen en steeds beter worden in wat je doet. Bij Delta Capita gaan we er niet vanuit dat dat vanzelf gaat. Samen met jouw manager bepaal je tijdens regelmatige contactmomenten persoonlijke ontwikkelingsdoelstellingen. Hoe je die behaalt? Onder andere met behulp van onze geaccrediteerde Delta Capita Academy, interne kennissessies, en trainingen zowel vanuit onze wereldwijde organisatie als externe partijen.De Financial Times noemde Delta Capita een van de snelst groeiende bedrijven van Europa. We zijn een scale-up die n√©t een beetje anders opereert dan de traditionele consultancybureaus. Onze organisatie kent weinig lagen en is wars van hi√´rarchie en bureaucratie. We bieden dus veel vrijheid en meer dan genoeg kansen om snel te groeien. Wij houden van ondernemende geesten en geven je veel ruimte om initiatieven te ontplooien en het beste uit jezelf te halen.Delta Capita is een internationale organisatie. Ons hoofdkantoor staat in Londen, maar we hebben ook vestigingen in onder andere Singapore, Dublin, Frankfurt, Hong Kong, New York en natuurlijk Amsterdam. Bij ons heb je dan ook de mogelijkheid om opdrachten te doen die de grens over gaan.Waar staan wij voor?Reinventing the financial services value chain. Dat is waar Delta Capita dagelijks aan werkt. Wij geloven in een vernieuwde financi√´le sector. Een sector die bijdraagt aan een duurzamere wereld om haar klanten beter van dienst te kunnen zijn. Om dat te realiseren, ontwikkelen en implementeren wij nieuwe producten en diensten die de status quo uitdagen en verandering veroorzaken in de sector.In onze wereldwijde organisatie staan diversiteit en inclusiviteit hoog in het vaandel.Met vestigingen op drie continenten zijn wij een multicultureel bedrijf dat de kracht kent van uiteenlopende perspectieven, achtergronden en levenservaringen. Samen excelleren voor een betere wereld. Daar geloven wij in.Onze kernwaardenMet lef, daadkracht en professionaliteit werkt Delta Capita samen om betere uitkomsten te realiseren. We zijn betrokken in ons werk, direct in onze communicatie en leren en innoveren snel. Zo zetten we verandering in gang en overtreffen we de verwachtingen van onze klanten in alles wat we doen.Wie ben jij? Master diploma behaald, bij voorkeur in business, economics of financeMinstens 3 tot 7 jaar werkervaring, bij voorkeur in de consultancy en/of financi√´le sectorVloeiend Nederlands en Engels, zowel in geschrift als mondelingOndernemend en met een passie voor vernieuwen, verbeteren en innoverenCommunicatief vaardig. Op professioneel niveau kun je omgaan met mensen uit alle levels van een organisatieAffiniteit met coaching en een positieve drive die je goed kunt overbrengen op de rest van het teamSterke analytische vaardigheden en oog voor detailStreeft altijd naar een maximale teamprestatie
Wat bieden wij? Een salaris tussen de 4000 en 7000 euro per maand excl. vakantiegeld, afhankelijk van jouw jaren werkervaring en senioriteitDe keuze voor een contract van 32 tot 40 uur26 vakantiedagen per jaarDe mogelijkheid om deels thuis te werken, inclusief faciliteiten voor een thuiswerkplekEen jaarlijkse prestatiebonus, op basis van bedrijfsresultaten en je eigen prestatieKeuze tussen een NS-business card of een kilometervergoedingGoede pensioenregelingToegang tot een uitgebreid, internationaal learning & development programma met ruimte voor individuele ontwikkelingstrajecten
Waarom Delta Capita?  Informele organisatiestructuur met korte lijnen waarin je de vrijheid hebt om jouw eigen kansen te cre√´ren en snel door te groeienEen gezellig team met internationale en ambitieuze collega‚ÄôsEen kantoor in Amsterdam met alle faciliteiten om optimaal te kunnen presterenRuimte om tijd te besteden aan goede doelen en andere initiatieven die een positief effect hebben op de samenlevingDe mogelijkheid om een sabbatical op te nemenAandacht voor financial & mental well-being

job_title: Strategy Consultant (m/f/d) in Hamburg or Munich
job_description:
About the job
            
 
TTE Strategy is an independent and multiple-award-winning, #1 boutique consultancy specializing in strategy and transformation. Founded in 2015, we advise and support clients around the globe on matters of strategy, operations, commercial excellence, and the digital transformation. We are based in Hamburg and Munich, Germany, and Zug, Switzerland.WE ARE LOOKING FOR:STRATEGY CONSULTANT (m/f/d) in Hamburg or MunichThis is what YOU are looking for: A real growth adventure during which your contribution has a tangible impact. A way of consulting that is not only about PowerPoint presentations but results. A place to learn and grow, with an emphasis on what really brings you further ‚Äì not what‚Äôs on a formal development plan. A team that seizes opportunities together.This is how YOU are: Enthusiastic, creative, and able to inspire ‚Äì even on a beginner‚Äôs level. Hands-on and proactive. Open to constant learning and improving yourself and others. Ready to build a new leading brand in the consulting market together with us.This is what YOU need: A master‚Äôs degree with excellent grades. Experience in business thanks to internships or a maximum of 2 years in consulting. Strong skills in analytical and structured thinking. Solid know-how of established software. Fluent in English. Willingness to travel. And, ultimately, the ability to have fun within a great team.So, if you really read all these lines up to here ‚Ä¶This is what WE offer you:Become a CREATOR of solutions for TTE clients and our growth company from day 1.Including: Working within a low hierarchy, directly with management and the TTE team, along with the guarantee that your ideas will not only be heard but also taken seriouslyBecome the DRIVER of your own learning curve.Including: Direct coaching from and sparring with your project leader, along with the guarantee that you will benefit from at least 2 high-profile external trainings per year that you select together with usBecome a great TEAMMATE and live up our international family spirit.Including: Prime office locations, regular team events, and the guarantee of a casual, family-like atmosphere of diverse, like-minded expertsBe appreciated and valued as a HUMAN, not as a resource.Including: Mental health programs, a mobility budget, and the guarantee of flexibility and remote workDoes this EXCITE you?Let‚Äôs get in touch. Now. We can‚Äôt wait to get to know you!For a first conversation, please send your CV with references to career@tte-strategy.com

About the job
            
 
Can‚Äôt wait to make an impact on the world? You‚Äôre not alone. Join us in driving progress in the working world and beyond. Your journey with us As a member of our Strategy and Performance team, you will help our clients to address business-critical issues, and support management teams in finding solutions to answering complex strategic dilemmas. Based on thorough market research and our strong strategic methodologies, you advise SME‚Äôs in the different strategic options to face the challenges of today and tomorrow.You will contribute to a wide range of projects across various industries, helping our clients cope with the challenges they are facing, linked to the corporate, sustainability, customer and/or digital strategy of the SME;Build strong market knowledge in order to obtain a strong sector understand to give clients insights in market trends, which will affect their current business;Provide our clients with a forward-looking view of the most important strategic topics affecting them; Support the client in determining its strategy and defining the right set of initiatives & projects to execute upon this strategy;You will advise family owned (private) companies with their growth challenges, transformation or international ambitions; the majority of the clients are located in Wallonia and Brussels; you will work with the management team and very often the owner of the company; Scope and deliver engagements, including leading the approach, liaising with stakeholders, and directing activities of people on the project team;Provide professional development opportunities and feedback for junior team members;Challenge the management of the companies with a critical mindset and based on strong (market) analysis;Prepare with the team market research and workshops; being able to facilitate workshops with management; delivering high quality strategic report based on a thorough understanding of the client challenges and profound (market) analysis.
 Let‚Äôs talk about youSuccessful candidates will have a degree from a top-tier academic institution, have minimum 5 years of relevant business experience, and the ability to meet each of the following criteria: Excellent academic credentials for both undergraduate and graduate coursework, MBA is a plus;A minimum of 5 years of previous work experience with a top consultancy practice, strategy house in SME market or internal strategy teams within a large companyHaving a strong affinity and interest in family owned (private) companiesProven track record in dealing with growth and transformation issues/strategies such as market expansion, customer insights, profitability management, etc.;Outstanding interpersonal and communication skills (including presentations), both written and verbal;Leadership qualities, project management skills, and people management and development skills with a strong focus on team development;Have a creative mind set, dare to think out of the box with an analytical touch;Ability to lead and direct cross functional teams;Strong skills to work with MS Powerpoint and MS Excel;Fluency in French & English, preferably also in Dutch 
Personal Qualities Valued: Intellectually powerful and agile: curious, pragmatic, rigorous, and creative;Be able to set up partnerships with colleagues and stakeholders. Be a trusted advisor, who is comfortable with working on difficult issues where there can be no definitive ‚Äúright‚Äù answer; patient in the face of uncertainty, complexity and ambiguity;Capable of working on multiple, overlapping tasks in a fast-paced environment;Able to take initiative and make things happen with moderate supervision and guidance.
 Accounting¬†is so much more than hard numbers. Think analysis, critical insights, problem-solving and strategic planning. The magic happens when analysis and insight meld. It‚Äôs what turns accountants into trusted advisors who use regulatory compliance and reporting to create opportunities and manage risk for our clients. At Deloitte, we advise a wide range of companies across multidisciplinary services ranging from accounting, tax, legal, mergers and acquisitions to services such as ‚Äúbusiness control & technology‚Äù and ‚Äústrategy & growth‚Äù tailor-made solutions. At the same time, our team of advisors handles cases with a satellite vision, enthusiasm and know-how. Part of the Accountancy family, the Strategy & Performance team offers family businesses & SME's clear strategic directions, monitor their businesses and transform their operations. Think analysis, critical insights, problem-solving and strategic planning. The magic happens when analysis and actions meld, to bring organizations to the next level. It's what turns Deloitte into a trusted advisor. Who is Deloitte? World-leading professional services firm, we offer value added services in audit & assurance, risk advisory, accounting, tax & legal, consulting and financial advisory. +6000 dedicated professionals, active in +10 offices throughout the country, take great pride in supporting our clients with multidisciplinary expertise, industry knowledge, and innovative solutions. ¬†We offer services to a wide variety of clients, from national and international companies, small, fast-growing and large organizations to public institutions and governmental authorities.Why Deloitte? Be the true you!¬†We foster diversity and inclusion and encourage you to bring your authentic self to work. Explore, question and collaborate while building a career that inspires and energises you. Never stop growing! Diversity of thought makes us stronger. At Deloitte, we tailor a personalized learning experience, offering you the opportunity to grow at your own pace and achieve maximum impact. We practice what we preach! As a Purpose-led organisation, at the heart of everything we do is a set of timeless principles and¬†unifying values.Life looks different for each of us, so we created a varied benefits package that you can tap into:  My Benefits My Choice, a flexible rewards plan tailored to your lifestyle and prioritiesSustainable transport options offered by¬†Mobility@Deloitte Flexible work arrangements for all and initiatives supported by¬†Parents@Deloitte Wellbeing tips and activities powered by¬†Energise@Deloitte Topped off with other health benefits and insurance opportunities
Empowering our employees with¬†flexible work arrangements¬†remains essential in today's reality:  Hybrid workplace:¬†combination of home office and on-site (+10 offices in Belgium or client's premises). Part-time employment: all our jobs are open to part-time work under a 90% or 80% regime.
Join us to make an impact together! Apply now!

About the job
            
 
Job Title: Senior Strategy Execution Consultant, up to ‚Ç¨80,000, Hybrid 2 days a week in office!Must speak English and Dutch Company Description:Our client is a leading global strategy company specialising in helping organizations execute their strategic initiatives effectively. With a presence in major cities worldwide, our client partners with businesses across various industries to deliver impactful strategies and drive successful execution.They are renowned for their deep expertise, innovative approach, and commitment to achieving tangible results for their clients. To further strengthen their Amsterdam office, they are currently seeking a highly experienced and dynamic Senior Strategy Consultant.Job Responsibilities: Provide expert guidance and support to clients in developing and executing their strategic plans and initiatives.Lead end-to-end strategy execution projects, ensuring alignment between overall business objectives and implementation roadmaps.Conduct thorough analysis of client organizations, market dynamics, and competitive landscapes to identify key improvement areas and formulate actionable recommendations.Collaborate with cross-functional teams to develop implementation plans, establishing objectives, timelines, and required resources.Facilitate executive-level workshops and meetings to drive strategic decision-making and foster alignment among stakeholders.Monitor project progress, identify potential risks or issues, and proactively recommend course corrections to ensure successful execution.
Qualifications: Proven experience (at least 4+ years) in strategic planning, strategy execution, or management consulting, preferably in a global consulting firm.Must have good business acumen.Fluent in English and Dutch.Strong track record of successfully leading end-to-end strategy execution projects, driving tangible results and creating value for clients.Deep understanding of strategic frameworks and methodologies, with the ability to apply them in a practical and results-oriented manner.Exceptional analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to synthesize complex information and present it in a clear and concise manner.Excellent communication and presentation skills, with the ability to articulate complex ideas to diverse stakeholders, including C-suite executives.Strong project management skills, with the ability to prioritize tasks, manage multiple projects simultaneously, and deliver within strict deadlines.Proactive mindset, with the ability to anticipate client needs, identify opportunities for improvement, and drive continuous process enhancements.Collaborative and team-oriented approach, with the ability to work effectively in cross-functional teams and foster a positive working environment.
If you are a seasoned strategy professional looking to make a significant impact by helping organizations execute their strategic initiatives successfully, this role offers the perfect opportunity to further develop your career within a global strategy company.Apply now and join a dynamic team of experts dedicated to driving growth and delivering exceptional results.

Our PurposeWe work to connect and power an inclusive, digital economy that benefits everyone, everywhere by making transactions safe, simple, smart and accessible. Using secure data and networks, partnerships and passion, our innovations and solutions help individuals, financial institutions, governments and businesses realize their greatest potential. Using secure data and networks, partnerships and passion, our innovations and solutions help individuals, financial institutions, governments, and businesses realize their greatest potential.Our decency quotient, or DQ, drives our culture and everything we do inside and outside of our company. About the job
            
 
Competitive business today is all about making intelligent, informed decisions. As a consultant within EY-Parthenon you will help make that happen. EY-Parthenon is a leading advisory organization focused on strategy consulting. We are committed to combining our unconventional thinking with our clients‚Äô smarts to deliver actionable strategies. Commercial strategy team is the specialized practice within EY-Parthenon, serving local and international private equity clients, their portfolio companies, and corporate clients from commercial due diligence to go-to-market and long-term growth strategies.The opportunityEY-Parthenon Commercial strategy practice provides investment and acquisition guidance through commercial due diligence work and strategic advice to companies and investors across such sectors as Technology, Media & Telecom, Retail & Consumer Goods, Healthcare, Energy and Financial Services. We support our clients realize their growth ambitions. You can expect to work on such strategy projects as commercial due diligence, growth strategy, new market entry, pricing and commercial excellence. Our team in the Netherlands is part of a global network with offices in Germany, UK, Nordics and the US.The EY-Parthenon team in the Netherlands is uniquely positioned in the intersection of strategy and technology, offering Software Strategy, Emerging Technologies Strategy and Digital Transformation services. As an integrated team, we are exposed to the cutting-edge tech market dynamics and engage in truly creative and thought-provoking projects.We are looking for colleagues to join us in Amsterdam as their home office. As a member of our vibrant and tech-savvy team, you‚Äôll have a unique opportunity to develop your career through a broad scope of engagements, mentoring and formal learning.What You‚Äôll DoSenior Consultants are the backbone of our case teams and are responsible for leading workstreams and contributing to overall engagements, translating client needs into project tasks and deliverables. Senior Consultants manage and execute day-to-day team analytical activities and serve as key liaisons between junior and senior team members and our clients. On any given day, you may conduct market research, interview industry participants, meet with company executives, conduct qualitative and quantitative analysis, or participate in client discussions.Our teams work on a variety of client issues. The assignments range from development of long-term growth, go-to-market and digital-focused strategies to evaluation of potential acquisitions of businesses through commercial due diligence. You will gain experience in creating data-backed analysis and insights, hone your ability to craft a compelling narrative and present findings to senior executives, and manage and mentor others on your team. You will have a seat at the table with CEOs and investors, helping these clients make more informed decisions and gaining first-hand insights into how investors and management teams operate and make decisions.You will: Support development of commercial strategies using tools such as market analysis, customer & competitor research, macroeconomic forecasting and portfolio optimizationReview and manage deal documents to identify critical commercial issues and risks related to a proposed transactionWork in project teams to deliver high quality output that addresses our client‚Äôs most pressing challenges and questionsPerform commercial analyses and translate findings into recommendations, being able to present outcomes to C-level executives and investment professionals Contribute to business development by preparing project proposals
What Working At EY-Parthenon OffersWe offer a diverse, ambitious, international and fun team. A competitive compensation package where you‚Äôll be rewarded based on your performance and recognized for the value you bring to our business. Plus, we offer: Unmatched opportunity to further develop your strategic thinking, sector knowledge and international network. You‚Äôll develop the mindset and skills to navigate whatever comes next Support and coaching from some of the most engaging colleagues in the industryWorking in the champions league of deals with the world's leading companies ‚Äì our clientsThe freedom and flexibility to handle your role in a way that‚Äôs right for youOpportunity to contribute to the next growth wave of our fast-growing business 
Skills And Attributes For Success Interest in strategy consulting with focus on M&A related topicsGoal-oriented with strong aptitude for quantitative and qualitative analysis and determination to deliver exceptional resultsCurious team player with the ability to adapt to changing requirements or deadlines in support of our clients‚Äô goals

About the job
            
 
Wat ga je doenAls Business Consultant ben je de sparringpartner op C-level, bij organisaties in verschillende branches. Door jouw kennis weet je snel inzicht te verkrijgen in de kern van de uitdaging die de klant heeft. Op basis van de huidige situatie, de organisatiedoelen en jouw visie ben je in staat een passend organisatiemodel en KPI-besturingsmodel te bedenken dat leidt tot focus en betere prestaties. Denk hierbij aan de herinrichting van teams, het veranderen van KPI‚Äôs en het verbeteren van processen.Met jouw kennis en bevlogenheid cre√´er je in alle lagen van de organisatie draagvlak voor de veranderingen. Ook zorg je voor de implementatie van het besturingsmodel en de nieuwe manier van werken. Zo wordt er daadwerkelijk vanuit een eenduidig besturingskader door de managers geacteerd. Jij weet de kennisontwikkeling van het gehele team een boost te geven door jouw expertise.Wie zijn wijHot ITem gelooft in wendbare, datagedreven organisaties die de concurrentie voorblijven door zich snel te kunnen aanpassen aan nieuwe ontwikkelingen. Alles wat wij doen heeft tot doel om de performance van mensen, afdelingen en organisaties onderscheidend te verbeteren. Dit doen wij samen met onze klanten, op basis van kwalitatief goede data en inzicht in de cruciale zaken.Al ruim 25 jaar ervaren we dat onze filosofie √©cht werkt. We staan voor een scherpe aanpak waarin we doorbraken cre√´ren op het gebied van prestatieverbetering en rusten niet tot de baten zijn ge√Øncasseerd door de klant.Wat bieden wij Een salaris passend bij jouw ervaring en expertiseEen contract voor onbepaalde tijd met mogelijkheid tot parttime werkenEen leasebudget en bonusregelingLaptop en telefoon van de zaakOnkostenvergoeding √©n internetvergoedingSabbatical opties en een goede pensioenregeling27 vakantiedagen en 2 prestatieverlofdagenAandacht voor een persoonlijk ontwikkelingsplan en veel mogelijkheden om kennis uit te bouwen via cursussen, trainingen en opleidingenFlexibel werken: regie over je eigen werktijden - naast thuis en bij de klant, bieden we je een goed bereikbare werkplek in Amsterdam met een prachtig uitzicht over het IJWekelijkse stoelmassage, een gym, Hot ITem sloep, dakterras en caf√© waar je altijd even een praatje kunt maken met je collega‚Äôs
Wat breng jij mee HBO/WO werk- en denkniveauOvertuigingskracht, communicatieve vaardigheden, flexibiliteit en inlevingsvermogenAnalytische vaardigheden, klantgerichtheid en organisatiebewustzijnMinimaal 5 jaar ervaring in een soortgelijke rol van Business ConsultantAffiniteit met factbased besturing en data-oplossingenAmbitie om klanten naar een hoger plan te tillen, samen met je teamUitstekende kennis van de Nederlandse taal

About the job
            
 
Job Requisition ID #22WD65930Job DescriptionNOTE: This is NOT an open position. Please submit your CV here for future consideration.Position OverviewAs a Business Consultant, you will be a strong strategic thinker with broad knowledge across an industry/sub-industry domain and its predominant technologies. Your expert facilitation skills and sharp business acumen will guide customers as they shape their vision in the context of industry trends, emerging technologies, and their desired business goals.You will work closely with our customers‚Äô senior leadership to develop their digital strategy and define criteria for success, assess current process and project performance, create business value justification for initiatives, and prepare to implement solutions that produce meaningful business results.Responsibilities Counsel customers on strategic transformation and innovation initiatives on process plant/factory planning and operation including supply chain integration (eg. Digitalisation, Industry 4.0, Corporate Real-estate Management, Building Information Modelling (BIM), Cloud-Platform, AI, ML) Translate vision and disruptive trends into measurable business outcomes Work closely with the customer at the executive and senior business leader level to clarify and prioritize their vision Recommend options and best approaches to achieve customer solution objectives, collaborating where needed with the Solution Architect, other consultants and other Autodesk stakeholders to prepare and present solutions to customersHelp prepare, review and manage high quality deliverable documents including proposals, business assessments and recommendations, business process analysis and workflow documentationAdvise in project cost estimating, delivery methodology and work breakdown tasks of proposed solutions Facilitate efficient decision-making processes and issue resolution Participate in sales and proposal presentations and identify additional product/services opportunities in customer organization Become established as an industry thought leader through identifying, creating, and promoting compelling insights related to area of expertiseTravel up to 50% 
Minimum Qualifications Excellent verbal and written communication skills in German and EnglishMaster of Science in Mechanical, Production Engineering or Process Engineering, or equivalent degree +5 years of industry experience, ideally in the Manufacturing Industry or within Factory Planning and Operation or Process Engineering Deep process knowledge of Autodesk and/or competitive products relating to Process Plant/Factory needs (e.g. AutoCAD Plant 3D & P&ID, Inventor, Factory Design Suite, Fusion 360, Dynamo, BIM 360, Revit) Excellent onsite and remote facilitation and conflict resolution skills Ability to convey complex technical details logically, build relationships, and influence Ability to define plausible solution definitions based on product and industry expertise Excellent team player supporting and interacting with other members of a shared responsibility team 
At Autodesk, we're building a diverse workplace and an inclusive culture to give more people the chance to imagine, design, and make a better world. Autodesk is proud to be an equal opportunity employer and considers all qualified applicants for employment without regard to race, color, religion, age, sex, sexual orientation, gender, gender identity, national origin, disability, veteran status or any other legally protected characteristic. We also consider for employment all qualified applicants regardless of criminal histories, consistent with applicable law.Are you an existing contractor or consultant with Autodesk? Please search for open jobs and apply internally (not on this external site). If you have any questions or require support, contact Autodesk Careers.Salary is one part of Autodesk‚Äôs competitive package. Offers are based on the candidate‚Äôs experience and geographic location. In addition to base salaries, we also have a significant emphasis on discretionary annual cash bonuses, commissions for sales roles, stock or long-term incentive cash grants, and a comprehensive benefits package.

About the job
            
 
Business ConsultantDit IT-adviesbureau is gespecialiseerd in Kennismanagement en Digitale transformatie binnen de kennisgebieden BPM, Linked Data en business- en informatieanalyse. Dagelijks werken circa 30 consultants aan mooie en vernieuwende projecten. Het betekent samenwerken met collega‚Äôs uit verschillende kennisgebieden om succesvol aan grote projecten te kunnen werken. De organisatie biedt een volledige end-to-end dienstverlening om digitale transformaties te begeleiden (van analyse tot implementatie).De organisatie is in haar groei en ontwikkeling op zoek naar Business Consultants ter versterking van het teamOmschrijvingAls Business Consultant heb je je kennis en ervaring opgedaan in het speelveld van ICT Project Management, Analyse, Architectuur of Low Code Development. In deze rol werk je deeltijds mee aan projecten voor onder andere Overheid, Financi√´n en Logistiek in dit vakgebied. Voor de organisatie zelf, werk je mee aan de business ontwikkeling van de organisatie in de vorm van inhoudelijke ondersteuning bij Productontwikkeling, Aanbestedingen, strategieontwikkeling etc.Je hebt het volgende profiel HBO/WO werk- en denkniveauKennis en ervaring binnen de domeinen Overheid, Banken/Verzekeringen of Vervoer is een preKennis en ervaring kan komen vanuit verschillende rollen: ICT Projectmanagement,Informatie Analist, Business Analist, Proces Analist, ICT ArchitectSolution Architect, Low code als Mendix-, Oracle Apex of PEGA Consultant,Ervaring met adviseringopdrachten (intern of extern) is een pre.
Als persoon ben je een bouwer, deel je graag je kennis met collega‚Äôs en klanten, je gaat voor kwaliteit en bent een echte teamspeler.Aanbod  Een uitdagende baan als Business Consultant waarbij je rol krijgt in de verdere opbouw van de organisatie;Een prettige en persoonlijke werkomgeving;Veel ruimte voor persoonlijke inbreng en initiatief;Contract voor onbepaalde tijd;Goed opleidingsbudget;Uitgebreid mobiliteitsbudget;Uitgebreid voordelenpakket incl. bonus, pensioen

job_title: Capgemini Invent: Strategy Consultant (m/w/d) ‚Äì Dein Einstieg in die Strategie- und Managementberatung
job_description:
About the job
            
 
Be part of our journeyDu bist auf der Suche nach spannenden Innovations-, Design- und Transformationsprojekten? Dann bist du bei uns genau richtig! Capgemini Invent ist eine international t√§tige Strategieberatung der Capgemini Gruppe mit √ºber 13.000 Mitarbeiter:innen an mehr als 36 Standorten weltweit. Gemeinsam mit dir unterst√ºtzen wir unsere Kund:innen dabei, ihre unternehmerische Zukunft zu gestalten und nachhaltige Gesch√§ftsmodelle zu entwickeln. Du willst auch deine eigene Zukunft gestalten und dich pers√∂nlich weiterentwickeln? Dann nutze jetzt die Chance und werde Teil unserer gemeinsamen Reise!Get the future you wantWir besetzen ganzj√§hrig unsere Consulting-Einstiegsstellen. Unsere St√§rke liegt in der Individualit√§t unserer Mitarbeiter:innen. Auf Basis deiner bisherigen Erfahrung finden wir so das optimale Team f√ºr dich. Du kannst dich bei uns in folgenden Bereichen spezialisieren: Business TechnologyWorkforce & OrganizationCorporate ExperienceEnterprise Data & Analytics
Schaue gern auf unserer Website vorbei, um mehr Informationen zu erhalten.What You Should Bring To Our Journey Einen herausragenden Studienabschluss (Bachelor/ Master) aller Fachrichtungen Spa√ü an der Kombination von Innovation, strategischer Analyse und Umsetzungsarbeit, sowie das Talent, konzeptionell und analytisch zu denkenHohe Zuverl√§ssigkeit, Teamgeist und Fit f√ºr eine weltweit f√ºhrende ManagementberatungInteresse und ggf. erste Erfahrungen im Pr√§sentieren oder Moderieren von WorkshopsExzellente Deutsch- und Englischkenntnisse sowie sehr gute MS-Office-Kenntnisse
Your Experience At Capgemini InventDu arbeitest an innovativen Strategieprojekten mit digitalen Zukunftsthemen und das in internationalen Teams.Du erf√§hrst Zusammenarbeit mit dem Top-Management mittelst√§ndischer Unternehmen, sowie b√∂rsennotierter Konzerne jeder Industrie.Du hast transparente Karriereperspektiven, sowie viel Raum f√ºr Eigeninitiative.Du bekommst dein individuelles Trainingsportfolio, sowie herausragende Weiterbildungsm√∂glichkeiten innerhalb eines weltweiten Expertennetzwerks.Du genie√üt flexible Arbeitszeiten und Home Office M√∂glichkeiten.Du profitierst von langj√§hrig gelebter und auf Werte ausgerichteter Unternehmenskultur.Wir freuen uns √ºber deine vollst√§ndige Bewerbung (Motivationsschreiben, aussagekr√§ftiger Lebenslauf, relevante Zeugnisse) ausschlie√ülich √ºber unser Bewerbungsportal.Es gilt der Kollektivvertrag f√ºr Angestellte (m/w/d) in Information und Consulting. Je nach Studienabschluss bieten wir ein Mindestgehalt von 55.000 EUR brutto im Jahr. Das erscheint dir wenig? Wir legen gro√üen Wert darauf, dass dein Gehalt in einem angemessenen Verh√§ltnis zu deinen F√§higkeiten und deinem Wert f√ºr unser Unternehmen steht. Daher ber√ºcksichtigen wir bei der Festlegung deines Gehalts sorgf√§ltig deine Qualifikationen und Erfahrungen, um eine marktgerechte √úberzahlung zu erm√∂glichen.Bei Fragen wende dich bitte an unsere Spezialistin Anna Barcichowska vom Talent Recruiting (anna.barcichowska@capgemini.com).

About the job
            
 
FunctiebeschrijvingWerk aan het vernieuwen of verbeteren van processen bij een van onze klanten en zorg voor maximale impact.Jouw rol in ons teamAls Business Consultant ben je onderdeel van een unit die de klant centraal zet en er alles aan doet om ervoor te zorgen dat de klant tevreden is over de verleende diensten. Je werkt aan het vernieuwen of verbeteren van processen bij een van onze klanten. Het totale proces, van offerte tot evaluatie, wordt door het team verzorgd. Je draagt bij aan de digitale transformatie van onze klanten en helpt hen om aan te haken bij de digitale transformatie.Hoe jij ons team versterktWe zoeken een veelzijdige, proactieve en analytische professional met een sterke toewijding aan teamwork en resultaten. De ideale kandidaat heeft de volgende kwalificaties:  Een (bijna) afgeronde wo-opleiding op het gebied van bedrijfskunde, bestuurskunde, of business & IT Affiniteit met informatievoorziening, consultancy, of beide De ambitie om je eigen carri√®re vorm te geven Zin om aan de slag te gaan met opdrachten voor klanten die ervoor zorgen dat Nederland blijft draaien
Waarom CGI?CGI is √©√©n van 's werelds grootste IT-consultancy bedrijven. Onze mensen houden Nederland draaiende. Overheidsinstellingen, banken, lucht- en ruimtevaart, infrastructurele organisaties en energie- en productiebedrijven zijn klanten van CGI.We werken aan interessante projecten die het alledaagse leven van miljoenen mensen raken. We zijn regionaal aanwezig, versterkt met wereldwijde domeinkennis, ons ecosysteem en collega's verspreid over de hele wereld.We zijn trots op de impactvolle projecten die we samen met onze collega‚Äôs tot een succes maken.Bij CGI hechten we veel waarde aan diversiteit en inclusie, omdat dit niet alleen de samenwerking bevordert, maar ook vaak leidt tot betere resultaten. We kijken uit naar jouw bijdrage aan ons team!Werken in kleine zelfsturende teams bestaande uit experts in je vakgebied.  De regie over je eigen carri√®re met daarbij de ruimte om jezelf te blijven ontwikkelen. Je werkt met de nieuwste technologie√´n. Een uitstekend salaris en aantrekkelijke secundaire arbeidsvoorwaarden Direct een vast contract Parttime mogelijkheden En de mogelijkheid om CGI aandeelhouder te worden
Waar kom je terecht?Je werkt binnen de Defensie-unit, onderdeel van de sector Defense, Transport & Logistics. Je maakt deel uit van een toegewijd team en hebt de kans om te werken in een uitdagende omgeving. We zijn een partner voor defensieorganisaties in verschillende NATO-landen, waarbij onze activiteiten vari√´ren van cybersecurity, informatiegestuurd optreden, cloud computing, biometrie en secure hosting tot elektronische oorlogsvoering en command & control, evenals ICT-beheer, systeemintegratie en strategische advisering.Sluit je aan bij ons team van experts en solliciteer direct! Solliciteer direct! We nemen dan zo snel mogelijk contact met je op. Vragen?Neem contact op met Lilija Alesjkevitsj (Recruitment Business Partner) via 06 2558 7597 of via lilija.alesjkevitsj@cgi.com.We werken niet samen met externe recruitment partijen. Acquisitie wordt daarom niet op prijs gesteld.Taken en verantwoordelijkhedenCriteriaBouwen met en op elkaarTechnologie is het hart van de digitale transformatie van ons en onze klanten, maar onze mensen zijn het hart van zakelijk succes.Als member van CGI ben je vanzelfsprekend een specialist in je vakgebied √©n een betrouwbare adviseur voor je klant. Je werkt samen met je collega‚Äôs aan concrete en duurzame resultaten die heel Nederland ‚Äì en ver daarbuiten ‚Äì draaiende houden. Elke dag heeft jouw werk impact.Je bent een 'member' omdat je shareholder en eigenaar van CGI bent. Samen bouwen we aan een bedrijf waar we trots op kunnen zijn. Al sinds 1976 is dit onze droom en die heeft ons gebracht waar we nu zijn: een van 's werelds grootste onafhankelijke leveranciers van IT-diensten en bedrijfsadvies.Bij CGI weten we dat diversiteit onmisbaar is. Daarom streven we op de werkvloer naar een inclusieve cultuur waarin er plek is voor iedereen. Zowel bij ons als bij onze klanten. We strijden voor gelijke kansen en willen dat al onze werknemers kunnen slagen en groeien. Daar helpen we graag bij.Klaar om deel uit te maken van ons succesverhaal? Word member van CGI! Hier maken jouw idee√´n en acties het verschil.

About the job
            
 
Vacature Traineeship Business Consultant Ben je net afgestudeerd, of studeer je binnenkort af en kan je niet wachten om een vliegende start te maken met jouw carri√®re als consultant? Ben jij de topper die nog lang niet is uitgeleerd? Meld je dan aan voor het Traineeship bij MLC! Nieuwe technologie√´n volgen elkaar steeds sneller op. De hoeveelheid data neemt toe, toepassingen worden slimmer en computers sneller. De interactie met klanten verandert en dat geldt ook voor de eisen die klanten aan organisaties stellen en dat heeft weer impact op de inrichting van de bedrijfsprocessen. Dit klinkt voor jou als het begin van iets moois, want door middel van onder andere data leg jij het fundament voor betere processen. Tijdens het traineeship word je klaargestoomd als Business Consultant om samen met de klant te zoeken naar mogelijkheden om klanttevredenheid te verhogen, kosten te reduceren en doorlooptijden te verkorten. Je zorgt voor een kwalitatief sterk en gedegen proces en leert hoe je om moet gaan met verschillende stakeholders en het implementeren van veranderingen.Wat ga je doen?Je start het traineeship met diverse trainingen waarin we je een grondige en brede basis geven van onze dienstverlening. Denk hierbij aan trainingen op het gebied van Business Process Management, Data Science, Lean, Agile, Verandermanagement en Adviesvaardigheden. Naast het volgen van trainingen, start je zo snel mogelijk ‚Äì en onder begeleiding van een ervaren collega ‚Äì met een opdracht bij √©√©n van onze klanten om direct een bijdrage te leveren aan het realiseren van organisatieveranderingen. Het traineeship bij MLC duurt 7 maanden, waarna je doorstroomt in de rol van Junior Consultant.Wat krijg je van ons? Veel aandacht voor jouw ontwikkeling en een persoonlijke begeleider die je helpt bij het vaststellen en realiseren van jouw leerdoelen;Volop doorgroeimogelijkheden om het beste te halen uit jezelf en je carri√®re als consultant;Een uitdagende rol in een team waarbij hard werken de norm is en inspirerende en betrokken collega‚Äôs altijd voor je klaar staan;Veel gezelligheid en sociale activiteiten met collega‚Äôs, zoals tijdens het jaarlijkse skiweekend, kerstdiner, BBQ en kennisconferenties;Een marktconform salaris, laptop, telefoonabonnement, flexibele werktijden en de mogelijkheid om gedeeltelijk vanuit huis te werken;28 vakantiedagen, extra vrije ‚Äòloyaliteitsdagen‚Äô wanneer je langer dan 3 jaar bij ons werkt en een winstdeling aan het einde van het jaar.Na doorstroming in de functie van Junior Consultant ontvang je een mobiliteitsvergoeding die je kunt inzetten voor een leaseauto of OV-kaart. Tot die tijd ontvang je uiteraard een vergoeding van alle gemaakte reiskosten.
Wie ben jij?Je bent analytisch en communicatief sterk, kan een situatie snel inschatten en toont initiatief en doorzettingsvermogen. Je hebt een bedrijfskundige, technische of cijfermatige studie afgerond (denk aan Wis- of Natuurkunde, Econometrie, Informatica, Bedrijfskunde, Economie of Bestuurskunde). Je wil graag ontdekken waar jouw talenten liggen en een kickstart geven aan jouw carri√®re. Je brengt ook persoonlijkheid mee: je kan je vinden in onze kernwaarde ‚ÄòSociaal Ondernemend‚Äô waarin we samen, authentiek, innovatief en resultaat gedreven aan het werk zijn.Over MLCMLC in Leusden heeft al 30 jaar een sterke eigen cultuur, die we omschrijven als sociaal ondernemend. Wij transformeren organisaties naar een optimale digitale procesomgeving waarbij de mens in zijn kracht staat. Bij MLC werken zo‚Äôn 30 ‚Äôprocesdenkers‚Äô. Jij werkt als Consultant in teams met wisselende samenstellingen voor toonaangevende klanten in verschillende branches. Denk hierbij aan woningcorporaties, overheidsinstellingen en zakelijke dienstverleners, zoals banken, verzekeraars en energiemaatschappijen.Stap binnen bij MLCBen jij de uitblinker die we zoeken? Vertel jouw verhaal en mail je cv en motivatie naar werkenbij@m-lc.nl. Wij kijken uit naar je sollicitatie!Neem contact op met onze Junior Office Manager Marieke Sindelka als je nog vragen hebt over de vacature. Zij is te bereiken via 035 - 548 65 65.Na jouw sollicitatieOm er zeker van te zijn dat we bij elkaar passen, leren we je graag in 2 of 3 gesprekken beter kennen. Het eerste gesprek heb je met onze directeur(en), de volgende gesprekken met directe collega‚Äôs. Zijn wij en ben jij overtuigd? Dan volgt een arbeidsvoorwaardengesprek, waarin we jou een aanbod doen.

job_title: Management Consultant to Capgemini Invent Business Technology - Graduate and Young Professional (Copenhagen and Aarhus)
job_description:
About the job
            
 
Do you want to jumpstart your career and get real hands-on experience of developing new digital solutions and business models of the future?Capgemini Invent is looking for ambitious and inventive graduates and young professionals to join our Business Technology-team in Denmark. As a Consultant at Capgemini Invent you will, together in a team, advise global business leaders and clients in major digital transformation projects.The Business Technology team has an inventive approach to digital transformation, helping to identify and implement disruptive services, platforms, architecture, and operating models that modern enterprises need to deliver real-business value securely, at scale, and with sustainability at the core.What can you expect? Working in a diverse environment and collaborating with our market-leading clients and experienced consultants.Joining a fast-growing firm on its continuing transformation journey and becoming part of a consulting powerhouse.Experience rapid learning, a well-defined career path, and support to develop into a successful consultant. In addition, you will benefit from training and mentoring programs to support your development.Capgemini Invent stands out with our collaborative culture and people, skilled professionals, industry expertise and comprehensive end-to-end capabilities within our Group.Embrace a culture where employees shape their own future. Enjoy a welcoming, social workplace with many exciting events and activities.
The person we wish to invite to join our mission: Holds a Master‚Äôs degree, with strong academic records, within e.g., Business, Engineering, Data, Computer Science, Technology or Innovation.Graduating during 2024, or recently graduated and holds 1-3 years of relevant work experience.Demonstrates exceptional analytical problem-solving skills, a creative mindset, and a passion for genuine innovation.Possesses an entrepreneurial drive for creating change and an insatiable thirst for learning.Excels in collaborative efforts and is comfortable working independently.Quickly grasps client business matters and is passionate about future trends.Holds excellent communication skills in Danish and English.In addition, international and professional experiences as well as extracurricular activities are seen as meriting.
We welcome you to join in Fall 2024, and you will be located in one of our offices in Denmark; Copenhagen or Aarhus , but with readiness to travel and work on projects at our client sites.If you have already graduated and hold relevant work experience after graduation, we welcome you to join us during Spring 2024.Does this sound like a great opportunity, are you ready to get the future you want?Seats are filled on an ongoing basis; we encourage you to apply as soon as possible! Apply by sending your CV and application in English and official University transcripts and High School grades. Please state clearly in your application your expected graduation date and to which office(s) you are applying. Please note that only complete applications are considered.About Capgemini Invent and the GroupAs the digital innovation, design and transformation powerhouse and brand of the Capgemini Group, Capgemini Invent enables CxOs to envision and shape the future of their businesses. Located in nearly 40 studios and more than 60 offices around the world, it comprises a 13,000+ strong team of strategists, data scientists, technologists, product and experience designers and brand experts developing new digital services, products, experiences and business models for sustainable growth.Capgemini Invent is an integral part of Capgemini, a global leader in partnering with companies to transform and manage their business by harnessing the power of technology. The Group is guided everyday by its purpose of unleashing human energy through technology for an inclusive and sustainable future. It is a responsible and diverse organization of over 370,000 team members in more than 50 countries. With its strong 55-year heritage and deep industry expertise, Capgemini is trusted by its clients to address the entire breadth of their business needs, from strategy and design to operations, fueled by the fast evolving and innovative world of cloud, data, AI, connectivity, software, digital engineering and platforms. The Group reported in 2022 global revenues of ‚Ç¨ 22 billion, up +21.1% vs 2021.We are very much looking forward to hearing from you!Read more about us at: https://www.capgemini.com/about-us/who-we-are/our-brands/capgemini-invent/Here you can find what our fantastic employees say about us in our employee stories: https://www.capgemini.com/se-en/careers/career-at-invent/#LI-DNI

About the job
            
 
More digital. More human. More Minsait.Si te apasionan el colaborar en proyectos que tengan un impacto real en clientes top y de diferentes sectores y quieres afrontar un nuevo desaf√≠o, te invitamos a convertirte en Minsaiter!. √önete a nuestro equipo para contribuir al cambio positivo que deseamos ver en el mundo, mientras creces en tu desarrollo profesional en un entorno estimulante.¬øPor qu√© te encantar√° ser parte de MBC?:Tendr√°s flexibilidad para que organices tu jornada cumpliendo con tus objetivos. Para nuestros/as Sr. Consultants este es un factor diferencial.Trabajar√°s con buena gente, brillante y sentir√°s el respaldo de la empresa, as√≠ como el apoyo de los managers y roles superiores. Nos apoyamos para crecer y aprender juntos.Participar√°s de un plan de carrera ambicioso con evaluaciones semestrales como incentivo para seguir desarroll√°ndote; adem√°s tendr√°s la oportunidad de aprender, liderar, y desarrollar habilidades con exposici√≥n a clientes y autonom√≠a en la ejecuci√≥n de tus actividades.Este sistema de evaluaciones semestrales es transparente, conocer√°s desde el inicio las reglas del juego.Cultura con claro enfoque hacia las personas, respeto por el medio ambiente, impacto social y que fomenta de la igualdad de g√©nero.Pasi√≥n por los resultados.Trabajar√°s con clientes IBEX l√≠deres en su sector implic√°ndote en proyectos interesantes: Agregar√°s valor y soluciones a las problem√°ticas de los clientes.En Minsait Business Consulting, An Indra Company, nuestro prop√≥sito se centra en impulsar el crecimiento nuestros los clientes, dejando una huella duradera en la sociedad y logrando un impacto inmediato en su desarrollo. Nos motiva ser catalizador del cambio que queremos ver en el mundo, colaborando para ello en el liderazgo y desarrollo de proyectos y tecnolog√≠as que permitan concretar esa visi√≥n.¬øCual√©s ser√°n tus retos como Consultant? An√°lisis y propuestas de soluci√≥n: an√°lisis de informaci√≥n para ejecutar propuestas de soluci√≥n. Esto implica identificar necesidades, riesgos y oportunidades, as√≠ como proponer alternativas y mejoras.Gesti√≥n de proyectos: planificaci√≥n, ejecuci√≥n y seguimiento de tareas, as√≠ como garantizar la calidad de los entregables y cumplir con los objetivos establecidos.Relaci√≥n con el cliente: establecer una relaci√≥n cercana con el cliente, entender sus necesidades y brindar soluciones que agreguen valor.Desarrollo de equipos: Motivar, formar y guiar a personas con menos experiencia.
.... Y como Sr. Consultant? Gesti√≥n y ejecuci√≥n de proyectos: Planificaci√≥n y ejecuci√≥n de tareas diarias del proyecto, participaci√≥n en la creaci√≥n de entregables, ejecuci√≥n de actividades estrat√©gicas y cr√≠ticas del proyecto, el monitoreo del avance y la comunicaci√≥n del mismo a los stakeholders.Relaci√≥n con el cliente: Gesti√≥n de la relaci√≥n con el cliente, gestionar sus expectativas, siendo un interlocutor v√°lido y buscando oportunidades de venta. Importancia de entender al cliente y sus objetivos para cumplir eficientemente con el proyecto.Liderazgo de proyectos y equipos: Asegurarse de la correcta ejecuci√≥n y control del proyecto, as√≠ como la gesti√≥n de equipos y la supervisi√≥n del trabajo de los consultores m√°s juniors.Desarrollo y formaci√≥n de equipos: Formar y desarrollar a los consultores m√°s j√≥venes, inculcando la filosof√≠a de trabajo de la empresa y transmitiendo que son un equipo.Generaci√≥n de oportunidades comerciales: Identificaci√≥n de oportunidades comerciales aprovechando su entendimiento del cliente y buscando nuevas oportunidades de negocio.
¬øQu√© te har√° triunfar en ambas posiciones? Que tengas entre 1 y 5 a√±os de experiencia en consultor√≠a de negocio (reingenier√≠a de procesos, oficina de proyectos, roapmaps, planes directores), bien en proyectos del sector financiero (banca, seguros, real estate), Sector P√∫blico u otros.Se valorar√° conocimientos en programaci√≥n en SQL, Python, R y tecnolog√≠a BI (SAS, Microstrategy, etc)Que seas nativo en espa√±ol y catal√°n. Adem√°s puedes participar en proyectos internacionales, por lo que es necesario que tengas un nivel de ingl√©s que te permita trabajar en este idioma de manera fluida.Nuestro formato de trabajo es h√≠brido, por lo que necesitamos que residas en Barcelona.
MBC, the place to beNuestro compromiso es promover ambientes de trabajo en los que se trate con respeto y dignidad a las personas, procurando el desarrollo profesional de la plantilla y garantizando la igualdad de oportunidades en su selecci√≥n, formaci√≥n y promoci√≥n ofreciendo un entorno de trabajo libre de cualquier discriminaci√≥n por motivo de g√©nero, edad, discapacidad, orientaci√≥n sexual, identidad o expresi√≥n de g√©nero, religi√≥n, etnia, estado civil o cualquier otra circunstancia personal o social.

About the job
            
 
Senior Business Consultant - ESi ‚Äì   ADP ESI is seeking to recruit a Senior Business Consultant based in EMEA to support the expansion of MNC solutions through pre-sales activities. In this pre-sales position, you'll be a trusted advisor to our clients, using your ADP service expertise and consulting skills to solve their most critical business challenges particularly related to Payroll/HR management and absence management and integration of the time solutions to the other multinational ADP offerings. In this position you will support the Multi country sales through the sales process, and support customers through the proof of concept and transition to the implementation and service teams. The successful candidate will also develop effective sales strategies with Multi country sales force, discusses time management product requirements with customers and analyze competitors' actions in the market.The candidate must have effective communication skills and be service focused, results oriented and be able to multi-task and meet deadlines. She/he will work with others in a demanding, fast-paced environment with a commitment to quality and a thorough approach to the work. KEY RESPONSIBILITIES: 1. Client facing activities: ¬∑ Perform Strategic selling in large MN companies environment¬∑ Increase sales performance by presenting Payroll & HR strategies and business solutions to prospects and clients¬∑ Understand client business requirements and configure the solution to demonstrate ADP's ability to solve client issues.¬∑ Understand and align customer needs with ADP MNC‚Äôs portfolio with specific but not exclusive focus on time management¬∑ Communicate with different audiences, appropriately adjust functional and technical content to meet different audience knowledge and interest, and can juggle meetings with multiple audience levels¬∑ Understand and support HR transformation discussion with prospects¬∑ Creatively and quickly respond to challenging questions with sound business acumen.¬∑ Liaise with internal partners for effective solution outcomes for the client¬∑ Utilise compelling presentation skills including the ability to take complex subjects and distil into a simplistic message to ensure that our clients/prospects understand the value and benefit of our services and multinational solutions ¬∑ Support RFP response process and scripted demonstrations within domain area of expertise¬∑ Demonstrate strategic and ethical use of competitive knowledge and intelligence¬∑ Support the negotiation process on all the contractual business appendixes¬∑ Participate in marketing events 2. Operational Support: ¬∑ Work with other members of the ESI Business consulting team, but also with the Business consulting teams in GES¬∑ Have the ability to work and perform under pressure in a multicultural sales environment¬∑ Have the ability to learn technology quickly through instruction and self-training¬∑ Coordinate the answers to customer requests ¬∑ Prepare and delivers sales presentations¬∑ Show and demonstrate offering‚Äôs value ¬∑ Participate in sales calls and meetings¬∑ Work closely with the sales team¬∑ Work closely with the Relationship Management, Implementation, Product and Client Service teams¬∑ Keep up to date with product developments¬∑ Work with the domain specialists to get information and updates on the offering¬∑ Travel to meetings with potential clients QUALIFICATIONS REQUIRED: ¬∑ Master or Bachelor‚Äôs degree with 2-4 years of sales or HR consulting experience with large, complex clients Preferred Expertise/Skills Preference will be given to candidates who have the following: Experience working with time management technology products and processesCollaborative, team player with strong self-starter attitudeKnowledge of Business Process Outsourcing is desired
¬∑ Communication (multi-lingual can be an advantage)¬∑ Assists in the facilitation of team and client meetings. ¬∑ Delivers informative, well-organized presentations¬∑ Understands how to communicate difficult/sensitive information tactfully ¬∑ Team player with good written and oral communication skills- Confident negotiator and ability to help ‚Äòclose the deal‚Äô ¬∑ Client management skills ¬∑ Ability to quickly learn new procedures, skills, and techniques¬∑ Ability to work under pressure¬∑ Ability to identify and ensure the timely delivery of critical information to internal analysis teams, sponsors, customers, and other interested parties¬∑ Ability to work and communicate effectively within a global team environment¬∑ Ability to effectively prioritize work¬∑ Ability to develop and explain technical decisions¬∑ Ability to recognize and deal appropriately with sensitive and confidential information¬∑ Ability to interact effectively with technical and non-technical audiences via both verbal and written communications (e.g., technical writing, procedural development, requirements analysis)¬∑ Ability to meet inflexible deadlines¬∑ Domestic and international travel as necessary  Strong presentation skillsAbility to travel 40%-60%
ADP is an Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action Employer; M/F/D/V. ADP believes that diversity leads to strength.

About the job
