About the job
            
 
In SimCorp, we assist some of the biggest financial institutions in the world to be fruitful by simplifying their investments, accounting, and operations.Our flagship product, SimCorp Dimension¬Æ, is a fully integrated front-to-back investment management solution, used by more than 200 clients located all over the world. It includes front office, middle office, back office data, and reporting solutions.SimCorp continuously enhances the portfolio of offerings to remain at the forefront of industry technology and trends. On top of this, over the last few years, we have been honing our service delivery and support model to implement SimCorp solutions to our clients and take ownership of running installations in the best possible way.This is why our Advanced Delivery Center (ADC) has been forged. First established in 2016 in Warsaw, Poland and extended to Manila, Philippines in 2021. Business Consultants in the ADC work, in close collaboration with our market units, on business functionality and solution workflows to tailor and deploy configuration of SimCorp Dimension to our customers.Why this role is important to us We are now looking for a Business Consultant to work in our IBOR team located in the ADC in Warsaw. As a Business Consultant, you will develop and carry out implementation plans in a client's environment. You will take part in delivery of SimCorp Dimension Operations Modules, including configuration, testing, documentation and giving trainings. You will act as a consultant for your clients and effectively handle, coordinate, and escalate issues as needed.What You Will Be Responsible For  Participate in all aspects of SimCorp Dimension implementations, including configuration, testing, documentation and training Document client‚Äôs requirements and map to SimCorp Dimension functions and processes, identifying process improvements and efficiencies where possible Design and deliver an overall solution set to meet client requirements, modelling operational workflows around SimCorp Dimension Delivering and customizing standard configuration solutions as well as designing and delivering new configurations Assist the client in development of overall test strategy and test plans and support the client in the execution of test cases, troubleshooting and resolving issues as they arise Provide configuration and end-user training, allowing the client to maintain SimCorp Dimension and optimize its usage Constantly expanding your knowledge of SimCorp Dimension and the clients' business in order to ensure that clients get the optimal configuration and workflow 
What We Value Your high-quality communication, coordination and interpersonal skills will enable you to direct all activities to success. As our preferred candidate, you will have: Degree/master's within Finance, Economics, Physics, Math, Science or Engineering Minimum of 4 years of relevant experience in the Financial Sector Knowledge of financial instruments and products, capital market and investments topics Understanding of middle-/back office day-to-day processing workflows Detailed understanding of at least one topic: transaction processing, reconciliation, settlement, SWIFT General Business Analysis exposure would be an asset High level understanding of requirements gathering sessions High level understanding of projects lifecycle as a team member You are result driven, creative, and analytical with a global perspective You are a focused, motivated individual working under minimum supervision You have high-quality communication skills especially in virtual collaboration You are fluent in English, any other languages (German, French, Spanish, Italian, Nordics) would be an asset Minimal knowledge of accounting topics (schemes, accounts, fund administration) would be an asset Technical IT knowledge and or experience (e.g., SQL, XML, XSLT, programming) would be an asset 
Benefits  Flexible working hours Private medical care (Medicover) Sharing the costs of sports activities (Multisport Card) Life insurance Possibility to develop your career in an international environment Professional training and courses (starting from a 3-week SimCorp Dimension¬Æ Academy) German and English language classes Integration events and charity projects 
In addition, we provide a good work & life balance and opportunities for professional development in an international environment: there is never just only one route - we offer an individual approach to professional development to support the direction you want to take. Visit our career pages to learn more about working at SimCorp: ‚ÄØ www.simcorp.com/career Next steps Please click below to apply. Get in touch with Hanna Brz√≥zka on hanna.brzozka@simcorp.com to learn more about the vacancy and what SimCorp has to offer regarding salary, benefits, and perks. Applications are continuously assessed. If you are interested in being a part of SimCorp but are not sure this role is the right fit, submit your CV anyway. SimCorp is on an exciting growth journey, and our Talent Acquisition Team is ready to assist you to discover the right role for you. The approximate time to consider your CV is three weeks.  We are eager to continually improve our talent acquisition process and make everyone‚Äôs experience positive and valuable. Therefore, during the process we will ask you to provide your feedback, which is highly appreciated. Who We Are For over 50 years, we have worked closely with investment and asset managers to become the world‚Äôs leading provider of integrated investment management solutions. We are 2,300+ colleagues with a broad range of nationalities, educations, professional experiences, ages, and backgrounds in general.  SimCorp is an equal-opportunity employer. We are committed to building a culture where diverse perspectives and expertise are integrated in our everyday work. We believe in the continual growth and development of our employees so that we can provide best-in-class solutions to our clients. While seeking to deliver client value, we believe it is vital to consider our people and our planet in every business decision we make. Acting responsibly is not optional. It is essential.

About the job
            
 
If you really want to make a difference ‚Äì make it with usSiemens Mobility is a separately managed company of Siemens AG and has been a leading supplier in the field of mobility for over 160 years. Our core business includes rail vehicles, rail automation and electrification solutions, turnkey systems and related services. We have always been very innovative in making traveling faster, safer and more comfortable. Today, we need new solutions to new challenges such as climate change and rising populations worldwide. That's what drives us. That's why we shape mobility with passion, always being one step ahead. Through digitalization, we make infrastructures smart and create opportunities that get us from A to B sustainably and seamlessly. Our 38,200 employees are pioneers in mobility who help to keep the world moving.What do you contribute?  Being part of our Strategy team, you will be responsible for evaluating and promoting innovative technologies and business models with the aim of realizing growth options for our software business unit.You will monitor market and competitors and prepare analyses for the management.Moreover, you will independently manage highly complex strategy, M&A and digitalization projects, bringing together different partners from across the company.With a strong solution-oriented approcaht, you will develop concepts (e.g. for partnering, regional go-to-market, or changes in the business model) and drive their implementation.You act internationally and across divisions to initiate measures and promote the exchange of best practices.In addition, you will continuously contribute to the improvement of methods and tools for the strategy process and business planning.
What do you bring along?  You hold a Master's degree in an economics or engineering discipline.In addition, you have many years of professional experience in the areas of corporate strategy or corporate development - in-house or in management consulting.You have experience with technological and business frameworks in the context of IT and software.Furthermore, you have experience in cross-functional and international projects, preferably also in the role of project manager.You also have a very good command of English and are willing to travel (approx. 20%).
What do we offer you? Mobile working /Remote workingWith us, you will have the opportunity to work hybrid. This means that you can work remotely to a considerable extent. We have officially regulated this through a company agreement.Inclusion & DiversityAt Siemens Mobility, we're committed to fighting injustice and inequality. At our company, you will find an environment where you can be yourself and belong.PurposeWe are pioneers in mobility. At Siemens Mobility, you will actively contribute to the transformation of transportation and climate protection in a market of the future, because our transportation solutions reduce CO2 emissions all over the world.Career growthWe offer comprehensive training opportunities for your professional and personal development. With our Learning Campus, we have an in-house service provider with a wide range of online and offline training courses.You Can Find An Overview Of Our Benefits Here.How do you get in touch with us? www.siemens.de/mobilityif you would like to find out more about Siemens before applying.+49 (9131) 17 52430if you wish to discuss any initial questions with our recruitment team. The contact person handling this job ad is Mr. Karl-Christian Gerbaulet.www.siemens.com/mobility-jobsif you would like more information about jobs and careers at Siemens.As an equal-opportunity employer we are happy to consider applications from individuals with disabilities.

job_title: Senior Business Consultant ‚Äì Investments and Front Office
job_description:
About the job
            
 
Who We AreFor over 50 years, we have worked closely with investment and asset managers to become the world‚Äôs leading provider of integrated investment management solutions. We are 2,300+ colleagues with a broad range of nationalities, education, professional experience, ages, and backgrounds in general. SimCorp is an equal opportunity employer. We are committed to fostering a culture where diverse perspectives and expertise are integrated in our everyday work. We believe in the continual growth and development of our employees, so that we can provide best-in-class solutions to our clients.‚ÄØWhile striving to deliver client value, we believe it is vital to consider our people and our planet in every business decision we make. Acting responsibly is not just optional, it is essential.Why this role is important to usIn SimCorp, we assist some of the biggest financial institutions in the world to be efficient by simplifying their investments, accounting, and operations. We do this through IT systems, processes, and financial knowledge. Implementing our software solutions by way of high-quality projects is at the core of what we do. To introduce our software to our clients and help enable them to reach their desired outcomes, business consultants are essential to us.As a Senior Business Consultant, you will be part of our team in EMEA Professional Services. The main purpose of the role is to contribute to the successful implementation of our software platform SimCorp Dimension¬Æ. You will own tasks throughout the implementation phases and be a trusted advisor to the client. You will mainly work remotely for projects in Germany, Switzerland, Austria or other EMEA locations. In addition, you will work with at least two process domains in the Investment and Front Office Service Line, including trading and order management, compliance, regulatory and internal restrictions, portfolio management, performance measurement and attribution, risk management (market and liquidity), regulatory topics such as Solvency II (incl. ORSA), as well as instrument valuation and analytics (theoretical pricing).During the three-week SimCorp Dimension¬Æ Academy, ‚Äòhands-on‚Äô experience with our software system will be a part of your onboarding. You are or will become a specialist within several areas in SimCorp Dimension.What You Will Be Responsible For Contributing to all aspects of SimCorp Dimension implementation projects Leading workstreams covering all required tasks, dependencies, and time/resource estimation Mapping to SimCorp Dimension functions and processes, as well as designing and configuring a customised solution Assisting the client in developing an overall test strategy, test plans, and in carrying out test cases Facilitating workshops to gather requirements for new and existing clients Mentoring, coaching, and helping colleagues to secure the project deliveries 
What we valueMost importantly, you can see yourself contributing and thriving in the position described above. How you gained the skills needed for doing that is less important. We expect you to excel at several of the following skills and be able to - and interested in - learning the rest. Effective consulting skills Experience with working in projects, e.g., software implementation projects Knowledge of financial instruments or the asset management business and processes Know-how in at least two of the following areas: trading and order management, compliance, regulatory and internal restrictions, portfolio management (equity, fixed income and derivatives), performance measurement and attribution, risk management (market and liquidity), regulatory topics such as Solvency II (incl. ORSA), instrument valuation and analytics (theoretical pricing) Enthusiasm to learn and use new software Good German and English skills 
BenefitsCompetitive salary, bonus scheme, and pension are essential for any work agreement. However, in SimCorp, we believe we can offer more. Therefore, in addition to the traditional benefit scheme, we provide an excellent work life balance and opportunities for professional development: there is never just one route - we offer an individual approach to professional development to support the direction you want to take. Visit our career pages to learn more about working at SimCorp:‚ÄØ www.simcorp.com/careerNext stepsPlease click below to apply or contact Rita Jeziorowski on rita.jeziorowski@simcorp.com to learn more about the vacancy and what SimCorp offers regarding salary, benefits and perks.Please note only applications sent through our system will be processed. Applications are continuously assessed, so please send your CV in English as soon as possible. If you are interested in being a part of SimCorp but are not sure this role is the right fit, submit your CV anyway. SimCorp is on an exciting growth journey, and our Talent Acquisition Team is ready to help you discover the right role for you. The approximate time to consider your CV is three weeks.We are eager to continually improve our talent acquisition process and make everyone‚Äôs experience positive and valuable. Therefore, during the process we will ask you to provide your feedback, which is highly appreciated

About the job
            
 
Gupta Strategists is een onafhankelijk adviesbureau voor organisaties in de zorgsector, in binnen- en buitenland. We doorgronden complexe vraagstukken en komen tot praktische oplossingen of innovatieve idee√´n.Bij Gupta werken we vanuit vertrouwen. Je schrijft geen uren en bepaalt je eigen agenda. Onze organisatiestructuur is plat en ellebogenwerk kennen we hier niet.TakenAls strategieconsultant bij Gupta Strategists werk je met een klein team aan grote projecten in de zorg. Je werkt als allround strategieconsultant aan projecten met uiteenlopende, complexe onderwerpen. Projecten vari√´ren van het ontwikkelen van nieuwe strategie√´n en implementeren van innovatieve idee√´n tot uitvoeren van uitgebreide (markt)analyses of begeleiden van fusies. Je werkt nooit solo aan een project, altijd met √©√©n of meerdere collega‚Äôs. Ook als starter ben je een volwaardig teamlid en werk je direct mee aan een project, maak je analyses, spar je met collega‚Äôs en geef je presentaties aan klanten.In principe werk je van maandag tot en met donderdag met je projectteam en op vrijdag met alle collega‚Äôs bij elkaar. Met je projectteam werk je op het kantoor van de klant, thuis, of op een locatie naar keuze. Op vrijdagen werken we samen op een toffe locatie centraal in het land (meestal in of rondom Utrecht of Amsterdam). Daarnaast kunnen we doordeweeks altijd bij een van onze favoriete locaties in Amsterdam terecht: Huize Frankendael.VereistenJe bent in de eindfase van je MSc of PhD, of hebt deze recent afgerond. Welke studie je precies gedaan hebt maakt niet uit; juist de combinatie van verschillende achtergronden maakt ons als team sterk. Je past bij Gupta als je ondernemend, nieuwsgierig, resultaatgericht en analytisch bent. Je duikt graag in cijfers en data, legt snel verbanden en bent in staat te structureren. Daarnaast beschik je over de juiste communicatievaardigheden, die je naar een hoger niveau gaat tillen wanneer je bij ons komt werken.Onze klanten hebben allemaal iets te maken met zorg. Denk hierbij aan ziekenhuizen, zorgverzekeraars, farmaceuten, ouderenzorgorganisaties, apothekers, GGZ-aanbieders, beleidsmakers, toezichthouders, investeerders, leveranciers en brancheorganisaties. Het is daarom een must dat je de zorgbranche interessant vindt, maar ervaring of achtergrond in de zorg is niet nodig. Nederlandse taal is een must (minimaal B2 niveau en bereidheid om te leren).Benefits Werken bij een vooraanstaande partij in de zorg-consultancy: een baan met een maatschappelijke bijdrageWeinig regels, veel vrijheid. We schrijven bijvoorbeeld geen uren, hebben een platte organisatiestructuur en je agenda en werktijden deel je zelf inCultuur gebaseerd op vertrouwen en hulpvaardigheid. Ellebogenwerk kennen we hier nietInspirerende, wisselende werklocaties op vrijdagen √©n de mogelijkheid om doordeweeks (als je niet bij de klant bent) in Amsterdam op onze vaste werklocatie te werkenInhouse trainingen en keuzevrijheid in het volgen van aanvullende opleidingen/cursussen voor je persoonlijke en professionele ontwikkeling (van korte cursussen tot een MBA)Vakantie is een welkome afwisseling van het harde werken. Je hebt bij ons geen maximumaantal vakantiedagen en we houden geen vakantiedagenadministratie bij.
Wil jij als strategieconsultant aan de slag met complexe vraagstukken in de zorg? Solliciteer dan nu! Voor meer informatie, neem gerust contact op met ons op. Graag solliciteren via: https://werkenbij.gupta-strategists. com/o/strategieconsultant-junior-mscphd

About the job
            
 
Change Consultant (medior) Dynamische en mensgerichte opdrachten binnen ons team Change.Functie/omschrijvingTijd voor verandering, Change Consultant. Bij Conclusion Consulting krijg je een baan met inhoud. Werk dat ertoe doet, zoals het: Uitvoeren, co√∂rdineren en borgen van de resultaten bij onderdelen van complexe verandertrajecten;Pragmatisch toepassen van verschillende soorten methodes en technieken bij deze verandertrajecten;Opbouwen en onderhouden van je relatienetwerk;Samenwerken en sparren met het management van onze klant;Delen van kennis met jouw collega‚Äôs;Bijdragen aan onze inhoudelijke ontwikkeling en profilering in de markt. Door bijvoorbeeld het organiseren van events en het innoveren en ontwikkelen van onze dienstverlening.
Hoe dit er concreet uitziet? Jij bent in staat het krachtenveld binnen een organisatie snel te begrijpen. En krijgt zo boven tafel welke verandering wordt gevraagd en welke roadmap daarvoor nodig is. Je hebt kennis van de ins en outs van het vak verandermanagement en met deze kennis ben jij d√© gesprekspartner bij opdrachtgevers. Van het vormgeven tot implementeren van strategische veranderingen zoals het veranderaspect bij implementatie van een nieuw ERP systeem of het herontwerp en implementatie van een nieuw organisatiemodel. Je hebt een goede visie op zowel de zachte als de harde kant van de verandering. Je laat zien hoe het anders kan. Laat jij een onvergetelijke indruk achter?Jou missen we nogJij bent te herkennen aan je inhoudelijke expertise, je enthousiasme voor de nieuwste ontwikkelingen binnen jouw markt en je kritische kijk op zaken. Je bent in staat om veranderstrategie√´n uit te voeren om de klant te ondersteunen in het behalen van de doelstellingen.Voor deze functie ben je vooral goed in het praktisch implementeren van (technologische) veranderingen binnen een organisatie, met een sterke focus op de menselijke maat. Anderen zijn er al genoeg, dus blijf vooral lekker jezelf. Dat is alles wat we vragen. Alhoewel, als Change Consultant heb je natuurlijk verstand van zaken, waaronder: Aantoonbare kennis en ervaring op het gebied van verandertrajecten en transformaties;Het vertalen van de inhoud in een concrete veranderroute en een interventieplan;Ervaring binnen consultancy;Ervaring in advisering en implementatie van verandertrajecten.
Voor deze functie heb je: Een afgeronde relevante hbo- wo-studie, bijvoorbeeld in (Technische) Bedrijfskunde, of Organisatiewetenschappen.Uitstekende beheersing van de Nederlandse taal in woord en geschrift;Minimaal 4 jaar relevante ervaring, o.a. als consultant.
ArbeidsvoorwaardenOmdat wij erop vertrouwen dat jij uitblinkt als Change Consultant bieden we jou een contract voor onbepaalde tijd met daarbovenop: Een marktconform salaris dat past bij jouw ervaring en groeipotentie, inclusief een bonusregeling;Flexibele werktijden en het werken vanuit huis. Wij geloven in het effici√´nt indelen van je tijd en de juiste balans tussen werk en priv√©;Een leaseauto (of mobiliteitsregeling), zodat je voor elke opdrachtgever aan de slag kunt;De kans om te werken aan jouw persoonlijke kwaliteiten, groeipotentie en vakkennis bij onze eigen Academy;De mogelijkheid om door te groeien binnen Conclusion Consulting en ons ecosysteem;Een laptop en telefoon, inclusief thuiswerk- en internetvergoeding;De optie om gebruik te maken van onze collectieve pensioenregeling en ziektekostenverzekering;Wekelijks een borrel en maandelijks een uitgebreide borrel met band of dj op het hoofdkantoor in Utrecht;Mogelijkheden om te sporten en met collega‚Äôs deel te nemen aan sportevents zoals de Dam tot Damloop.
Bij Conclusion Consulting nemen we onze verantwoordelijkheid voor milieu en maatschappij. Met concrete initiatieven dragen wij bij aan ‚ÄòOngelijkheid verminderen‚Äô (SDG 10) en ‚ÄòKlimaatactie‚Äô (SDG 13).Trek je conclusie en solliciteerBenieuwd naar andere projecten die nu lopen? Ik, recruiter Iris Pitar, kan je er alles over vertellen. Je bereikt me via 06 - 22 88 39 58 en ipitar@conclusion.nl.Wij zijn altijd op zoek naar goede kandidaten, vandaar dat de vacature open blijft staan.Als Conclusion geloven wij in verschillen: in mensen, karakters, expertises. Juist die combinatie van verschillen verbindt ons en zorgt voor oplossingen die impact maken. Wij geloven in je. Gewoon, in wie jij bent. Want van anderen zijn er al genoeg. Het maakt ons daarom niet uit waar je geboren bent, waar je in gelooft of van wie je houdt. We zijn nieuwsgierig naar jouw talent en hoe jij het verschil maakt voor onze organisatie.Solliciteer je direct en heb je het juiste profiel, dan maken we snel een afspraak op een moment dat het jou uitkomt.

About the job
            
 
652099BRIntroductionAt IBM, work is more than a job - it's a calling: To build. To design. To code. To consult. To think along with clients and sell. To make markets. To invent. To collaborate. At IBM, we pride ourselves on being an early adopter of artificial intelligence, quantum computing and blockchain. Now it‚Äôs time for you to join us on our journey to being a responsible technology innovator and a force for good in the world.Location StatementIBM wants you to bring your whole self to work and for you this might mean the ability to work flexibly. About the job

job_description:
About the job
            
 
En O2O tenemos un equipo especializado en ofrecer servicios de consultor√≠a en Digital Business y Digital Transformation, alineando las necesidades que negocio e IT tienen en √°reas como la innovaci√≥n, movilidad, ecommerce o digalizaci√≥n de procesos. Acompa√±amos a los clientes en la toma de decisiones sobre su estrategia de negocio Digital, Martech, Loyalty, Experiencia de Usuario, Tecnolog√≠as y Desarrollo, basado en 3 pilares fundamentales: Asesor√≠a estrat√©gica de Transformaci√≥n Digital, constante evoluci√≥n (Devops) y crecimiento de negocio (Growth). Participamos en proyectos digitales multi-sectoriales, especialmente aquellos que son transaccionales, con operativa de negocio y de fidelizaci√≥n. Trabajamos con clientes en sectores como Travel, Banca/Seguros, Puntos de Venta y Deportes/Ocio. Medimos y parametrizamos todo lo que ocurre en esos canales para garantizar la consecuci√≥n de los objetivos y la monetizaci√≥n de los mismos. Deseamos poder incorporar a un Consultor de estrategia digital / Product Owner De ti esperamos:  Conocimiento y experiencia en la implementaci√≥n de proyectos de fidelizaci√≥n, CRM, estrategia de Loyalty y reglas de negocio e incentivo. COMPETENCIAS NO T√âCNICAS: Habilidades de comunicaci√≥n verbal y escrita.Habilidades en la resoluci√≥n de conflictos. Motivaci√≥n. Capacidad de impacto e influencia. Comprensi√≥n interpersonal. Orientaci√≥n al logro.Pensamiento anal√≠tico. Flexibilidad.Preocupaci√≥n por la calidad y atenci√≥n al detalle. Autocontrol.Capacidad de multitarea.  FORMACI√ìN: Ingeniero Superior en inform√°tica, Administraci√≥n y Direcci√≥n de Empresas, Marketing, Publicidad, ... Formaci√≥n en E-business y negocio digital. Alto nivel de ingl√©s. Experiencia con Google Analytics. Conocimiento de metodolog√≠as √°giles. Deseable certificado Product Owner y Kanban.

About the job

About the job
            
 
652099BRIntroductionAt IBM, work is more than a job - it's a calling: To build. To design. To code. To consult. To think along with clients and sell. To make markets. To invent. To collaborate. Must be able to demonstrate and communicate results in a compelling way to realize the value.Required Technical and Professional Expertise OpenText Intelligent CapturePlanet IDAParadatec PROSAR-AIDAGerman Public Health InsuranceLanguages required: German, English

We believe in the power of technology responsibly used to help people, partners and the planet.Your Life @ IBMIn a world where technology never stands still, we understand that, dedication to our clients success, innovation that matters, and trust and personal responsibility in all our relationships, lives in what we do as IBMers as we strive to be the catalyst that makes the world work better.Being an IBMer means you‚Äôll be able to learn and develop yourself and your career, you‚Äôll be encouraged to be courageous and experiment everyday, all whilst having continuous trust and support in an environment where everyone can thrive whatever their personal or professional background.Our IBMers are growth minded, always staying curious, open to feedback and learning new information and skills to constantly transform themselves and our company. job_title: Org Design and Change Senior Consultant (EMEA)
job_description:
About the job
            
 
Want to build a stronger, more sustainable future and cultivate your career? Join Cargill's global team of 160,000 employees who use new technologies, dynamic insights and over 157 years of experience to connect farmers with markets, customers with ingredients, and people and animals with the food they need to thrive.Job Purpose and ImpactThe Organizational Design (OD) & Change Senior Consultant will flex across assignments supporting various Enterprise groups or Functions. The Org Design & Change Senior Consultant will deliver Organizational Design, Change Management, for large and complex initiatives as well as Strategic Workforce Planning. This role will establish strong working relationships across Strategy & Transformation and HR Business Partners to successfully navigate the European Works Council in matters related to organizational change and design.The role is based in EMEA tied to a Cargill location.Key Accountabilities Deploy Org Design and Change efforts to large scale and complex programs and initiatives, leveraging Cargill‚Äôs standardized frameworks, methodology and toolsResponsible for supporting as an orchestrator the multiple strategic initiatives running in parallel of Enterprise/Function transformations, while facilitating the projects change management effort (i.e., ensure seamless transitions and key stakeholder buy-in)Ensure roadmaps and requirements for transformation execution are shaped, understood and delivered at the right time and with the highest quality of deliveryPartner across the Strategy and Transformation team to ensure cohesive alignment and to enable the overall HR vision and strategy (e.g., connected European Works Council approach)Own lessons learned from each project in coordination with HR colleagues and business leaders (liaison with various S&T leads e.g., Change Management Practice Lead) to ensure feedback and lessons learned are documented and used during strategy refreshFoster a strong continuous improvement culture to ensure deployment of scalable, simplified and standardized processes and be a change leader to inject strategic and innovative thinking into initiatives and projects. Flex across various Enterprise/Function to ensure Enterprise/Functional demand is met with allocated resourcesPartner across the Strategy and Transformation team and with HR Business Partners to prepare for and navigate European Works Council activities related to change and organizational design. Provide expert thought leadership in your field and work with limited direction, using additional research and interpretation to identify issues or problems. You may provide direction to supporting team members and be a strategic contributor. 
QualificationsMinimum Qualifications  Bachelor‚Äôs degree in human resources or related field or equivalent experience6 years of org design/change management experience, including experience managing a complex portfolio of work within an HR functionDemonstrated experience preparing for and working with the European Works Council in matters related to change and organizational design. 
Preferred Qualifications Master's degree or other post-secondary degreeOrganizational development or change management certificationAbility to combine strategic thinking and operational executionStrong analytical and critical thinking skillsDemonstrated business and/or global acumenAbility to deliver on the needs of multiple stakeholdersStrong verbal and written communication; strong presentation skillsExcellent leadership skills, with demonstrated experience building, managing, and influencing a high-performing global teamFamiliarity and experience working with EWC is desired
Our OfferWe provide a fast paced stimulating international environment, which will stretch your abilities and channel your talents. We also offer competitive salary and benefits combined with outstanding career development opportunities in one of the largest and most solid private companies in the world.Interested? Then make sure to send us your CV and cover letter in English today: Follow us on LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/cargillCargill is committed to being an inclusive employer. Click here to find out more https://careers.cargill.com/diversity/

About the job
            
 
Strategisch ConsultantAls Strategisch Consultant bij Conclusion Consulting challenge je op strategisch niveau zaken als wendbaarheid, weerbaarheid en onderscheidend vermogen van organisaties.Functie-omschrijvingTijd voor verandering, Strategisch Consultant. Bij Conclusion Consulting krijg je een baan met inhoud. Werk dat ertoe doet, zoals het: In kaart brengen, beoordelen, vernieuwen en herontwerpen van strategie in samenwerking met het management van onze klant;Maken van een vertaalslag van een bedrijfsstrategie naar een strategie in de digitale wereld;Co√∂rdineren van implementatieprojecten;Actief bouwen aan en onderhouden van waardevolle relaties binnen je netwerk;Commerci√´le kansen signaleren en het werven van opdrachten voor jezelf en collega‚Äôs;Een waardevolle bijdrage leveren aan onze voortdurende professionele groei en zichtbaarheid in de markt.
Hoe dit er concreet uitziet? Gaat jouw hart sneller kloppen van (digitale) strategie? Ben je enthousiast over het werken in diverse vakgebieden? Beschik je over de vaardigheid om snel te schakelen tussen verschillende opdrachtgevers en ben je in staat makkelijk verbindingen te maken? Voel je je daarnaast zelfverzekerd genoeg om de uitdaging aan te gaan met het management van onze gewaardeerde klanten? Als Strategisch Consultant bij Conclusion Consulting verwezenlijk je strategische ambities van beursgenoteerde, internationale organisaties.Samen met de klant ontwikkel je tijdens scherpe, interactieve sessies de digitale strategie en neem je jouw verantwoordelijkheid bij implementatieprojecten. Ook verstevig je het bijbehorende leiderschap. Wij brengen de klant direct in beweging; vanuit de strategie naar concrete acties en besluiten, zonder onnodig lange analyses en rapportages.Je werkt vaak in teamverband aan projecten. Samen met je team daag je de traditionele wereld van strategieconsultants uit. In je rol als Strategisch Consultant heb je veel vrijheid en verantwoordelijkheid. Zo maak jij op jouw manier impact. Zo ben jij van betekenis.Jou missen we nogJij bent te herkennen aan je creatieve aanpak, je persoonlijke benadering en je kraakheldere eigen visie.Natuurlijk haal je energie uit het adviseren van klanten en samenwerken met collega‚Äôs. Daarnaast ben je een consultant die door de bomen het bos blijft zien. Bovenal durf je jezelf te zijn. Verder heb je als Strategisch Consultant verstand van de volgende zaken: Aantoonbare kennis en ervaring op het gebied van digitale transformaties;Ervaring in adviseren en begeleiden van verandertrajecten;Het zelfstandig analyseren van klantvragen en werken naar een concrete oplossing. Dat doe je methodisch, in samenwerking met de klant en altijd gericht op het toevoegen van waarde;Het faciliteren van interactieve teamsessies.
Verder heb je voor deze functie: Een afgerond hbo- of wo-opleiding in de richting van bijvoorbeeld bedrijfskunde, economie, organisatiepsychologie of change management;Minimaal 4 jaar relevante werkervaring, o.a. op het gebied van consultancy;De skills om tot de kern te komen als het gaat om strategische vraagstukken bij grote, impactvolle organisaties;Een creatieve aanpak, waarbij je eigen persoonlijke benadering cruciaal is;De drang om je te ontwikkelen en een zelfverzekerde houding.
ArbeidsvoorwaardenOmdat wij erop vertrouwen dat jij uitblinkt als Strategisch Consultant, bieden we jou een contract voor onbepaalde tijd met daarbovenop: Een marktconform salaris dat past bij jouw ervaring en groeipotentie inclusief een bonusregeling;Flexibele werktijden en het werken vanuit huis. (Wij geloven in het effici√´nt indelen van je tijd en de juiste balans tussen werk en priv√©);Een leaseauto (of mobiliteitsregeling) zorgt ervoor dat je voor elke opdrachtgever aan de slag kunt;Werken aan jouw persoonlijke kwaliteiten, groeipotentie en vakkennis binnen onze eigen Academy;De mogelijkheid om door te groeien binnen Conclusion Consulting en ons ecosysteem;Een laptop en telefoon inclusief thuiswerk- en internetvergoeding;Je kunt gebruik maken van onze collectieve pensioenregeling en ziektekostenverzekering;Wekelijks een uitgebreide borrel en maandelijks een uitgebreide borrel met band of dj op het hoofdkantoor in Utrecht;Vitaliteit hebben wij hoog in het vaandel en hebben een eigen programma ontwikkeld namelijk Charge. Dit zodat onze consultants weerbaar en vitaal blijven en zo blijven groeien als high performance consultant;Mogelijkheden om te sporten en met collega‚Äôs deel te nemen aan sportevents zoals de Dam tot Damloop.
Bij Conclusion Consulting nemen we onze verantwoordelijkheid voor milieu en maatschappij. Met concrete initiatieven dragen wij bij aan ‚ÄòOngelijkheid verminderen‚Äô (SDG 10) en ‚ÄòKlimaatactie‚Äô (SDG 13).Trek je conclusie en solliciteerBenieuwd naar andere projecten die nu lopen? Ik, recruiter Nathalie van den Berg, kan je er alles over vertellen. Je bereikt me via 0614725259 en nathalie.van.den.berg@conclusion.nl.Wij zijn altijd op zoek naar goede kandidaten, vandaar dat de vacature open blijft staan.Solliciteer je direct en heb je het juiste profiel, dan maken we snel een afspraak op een moment dat het jou uitkomt.

About the job
            
 
Description   Given the growth that Efficio is going through, we are looking for Manager/Senior Manager level procurement and supply chain management consultants to support our increasing presence in Germany. Based out of the office in Dusseldorf, Germany, these experienced consultants will spend up to 4 days on client site across the Germany and wider Europe.Efficio's Managers/Senior Managers lead our engagements with clients. They have overall responsibility for ensuring that the objectives of the engagement are achieved and client expectations are met.These Managers/Senior Managers set the strategic direction for the engagement and work with Consultants and other team members to ensure each project workstream is strategically aligned. While they must maintain a ‚Äòbig picture‚Äô view, they must also have a good understanding of the detail within each individual workstream.This candidate will have both an external and an internal focus. Externally, they must build deep relationships with senior client stakeholders to ensure they are fully engaged with the project and the proposed solutions. They are also responsible for identifying additional business development opportunities, both within the engagement and beyond.Internally, our Managers/Senior Managers are responsible for leading, challenging and motivating their team to continually deliver the best possible outcomes for clients. They act as a sounding board for team members, challenging ideas and guiding the development of strategic solutions. They are responsible for building a positive, collaborative and high-performing culture within their project teams. They also have a key role in developing more junior team members in particular, providing coaching and mentoring to help develop their consulting skills and capabilities.Efficio Managers/Senior Managers enjoy a great deal of autonomy and responsibility for the success of client engagements. It‚Äôs a demanding role where the ability to work effectively under pressure, and the willingness to take responsibility and challenge yourself is paramount. Highly developed interpersonal, leadership, strategic and analytical skills are also essential.This role is challenging - but it‚Äôs also highly rewarding. Efficio offers a highly collaborative, merit-based environment where performance is recognised and rewarded. Above all, the role offers the enormous satisfaction of leading large and significant assignments across a range of industries and sectors, for some of the world‚Äôs leading companies. Essential Requirements   Fluency in Germany and English is essential Substantial prior relevant management consulting experience within a leading consultancy within procurement and supply chain is essential, ideally with some previous experience in Business Development An exemplary academic background; preferably with a top degree in Engineering, Science, Business, or Economics Functional knowledge in the areas of strategic sourcing, procurement transformation, supply chain Must have the right to work in the country in which you are applying
 Desirable Requirements   Experienced project manager, including planning, execution and risk management Demonstrated ability to work in complex environments both independently and as part of a team Demonstrated people management skills, including coaching of both consultants and client staff Strong communicator with the ability to influence stakeholders of all levels Excellent problem solving skills Travel flexibility required

About the job
            
 
Functie omschrijving‚Ä¢ Je vervult afwisselend de rol van ICT Manager, zoals bij het helpen opstellen en reviewen van het ICT beleid, of in de rol van inhoudelijk sparringpartner bij pakketselecties, het opstellen van een roadmap en budgetten of je neemt deel aan meetings met derden.‚Ä¢ Je vervult een tactische rol als servicemanager en projectmanager of als inhoudelijk expert.‚Ä¢ De IT Business Consultant is betrokken bij escalaties en speelt een actieve rol in de communicatie en co√∂rdinatie en werkt nauw samen met de operatie (Managed Services).‚Ä¢ Adviseren op strategisch/tactisch- en operationeel niveau.‚Ä¢ Opstellen van Service Level Rapportages en Service Management gesprekken voeren.‚Ä¢ Sparringpartner van de business en aandragen van oplossingen op het gebied van Cloud, Informatiebeveiliging en/of netwerkoplossingen.Functie eisen‚Ä¢ Kunnen vertalen van business vraagstukken naar IT oplossingen.‚Ä¢ Ervaring met implementeren en optimaliseren van nieuwe, functionele en/of technische oplossingen.‚Ä¢ Ervaring met Managed Services, ICT dienstverlening.‚Ä¢ Kennis van de ISO 27001 norm.‚Ä¢ Kunnen overtuigen op inhoud, je helpt klanten bij het realiseren van hun doelen.‚Ä¢ Goede beheersing van de Nederlandse en Engelse taal.‚Ä¢ Ervaring als technisch consultant en/of functioneel/technisch specialist binnen het vakgebied van Cloud oplossingen, informatiebeveiliging en/of netwerken.‚Ä¢ HBO werk- en denkniveau, bij voorkeur een opleiding in de ICTBedrijfsprofielDeze ICT dienstverlener biedt, met ca. 50 consultants en specialisten, de volgende diensten:‚Ä¢ Managed Services: volledig gericht op organisaties die een gedeelte of de gehele ICT willen uitbesteden. De opdrachtgever wordt in het beheer van de ICT Infrastructuur volledig ontzorgd op operationeel, tactisch en strategisch niveau. Een skilled support afdeling is 24 x 7 operationeel.‚Ä¢ ICT Security & Consultancy services: support om een gedegen ICT & Security beleid te implementeren voor de opdrachtgevers. Analyseren van het ICT & Security beleid en maken een plan van aanpak op alle niveaus.‚Ä¢ Tijdelijk inzet van kenniscapaciteit: gecertificeerde professionals van supportmedewerkers tot engineers en van consultants tot security officers.‚Ä¢ Focus op de Nederlandse en Amerikaanse markt met een kantoor in Hilversum en in New York.Bedrijfscultuur‚Ä¢ Focus op service en kwaliteit.‚Ä¢ Veel investeren in kennisontwikkeling van de medewerkers.‚Ä¢ Persoonlijke aandacht zowel naar opdrachtgevers als naar collega's.‚Ä¢ Plezier in het werk en liefde voor het vakgebied staan voorop.ArbeidsvoorwaardenUitstekende arbeidsvoorwaarden:‚Ä¢ Prima salaris dat in overleg wordt bepaald.‚Ä¢ Ruim budget voor opleidingen.‚Ä¢ Goede pensioenvoorzieningen.‚Ä¢ Aantrekkelijke optie om aandeelhouder/partner te worden.

job_title: Capgemini Invent - Senior Consultant Finance Transformation
job_description:
About the job
            
 
About Capgemini InventAs the digital innovation, design and transformation brand of the Capgemini Group, Capgemini Invent enables CxOs to envision and shape the future of their businesses. Located in more than 36 offices and 37 creative studios around the world, it comprises a 10,000+ strong team of strategists, data scientists, product and experience designers, brand experts and technologists who develop new digital services, products, experiences and business models for sustainable growth.Role and Responsibilities Support our clients in the transformation of their Finance department and the optimization of their activities and processes / operating modelDevelop the case-for-change, including a business case, that covers people, process, technology, and data for enterprise transformationDesign and implement target operating models and finance operations (incl. accounting, controlling)Foster digitization, leveraging e.g. SAP S/4HANAOptimize Controlling & Steering - Conception of management reporting based on current analytics solutions, design of global controlling/forecasting concepts for our internationally operating clientsEvaluate relevance of new technologies (e.g. around AI) and their impact on accounting and finance departments Optimize E2E processes (P2P, R2R, O2C ‚Ä¶), leveraging best practices in process modelling/optimization/automation/mining‚Ä¶ Provide active support to cross-functional project teams, act as the interface between strategy, Business and IT Continuously develop Consulting Skills: communication, analytics, project management; working effectively in a team with other consultants from various backgrounds; learning and implementing the Capgemini Invent procedures and values Contribute to the performance of Capgemini Invent: as you develop your expertise, you‚Äôll be encouraged to support business development activities, create engaging content, share your knowledge and steer others
Qualifications And Education Requirements Understanding of core Finance processes, experience in Finance, Controlling 3-5 years of experience in operational excellence , ranging from the modelling and optimization of finance processes to finance operating model design and implementation ERP experience - ideally with exposure to core SAP S/4HANA modules (FI CO MM‚Ä¶) EPM & Data platform experience Affinity with organizational change management and adoption Eventual exposure to outsourcing & shared servicesA Master Degree in business engineering, applied economics, finance or similar
Preferred Skills /Profiles/experiences You have a thorough understanding of Finance processes You have affinity with IT, incl. ERP (ideally SAP)You are comfortable analyzing problems and proposing solutions You are an engaging storyteller with excellent written & oral communication skillsYou are a proactive, team player with an entrepreneurial mindset and the drive to deliver high quality results You are fluent in English and with, at least, a good knowledge of French and/or Dutch 
What we offerAt Capgemini, we actively embody our motto: "Get the future you want.": A stimulating and intellectually challenging role within a leading management consulting company An interesting salary package including a company car or mobility budget, fringe benefits A clear and direct career path with ample growth potential, within a dynamic and diverse team Autonomy to shape your growth path, with opportunities to work on initiatives that align with your interests and capabilities Tailored Training and Personal Development opportunities to support your professional ambitions Flexible working arrangements, encompassing teleworking, flexible working hours, and opportunities for working abroadPersonalized mentoring provided by a dedicated counselor to facilitate your personal and professional growth within the organizationAn inspiring and collaborative atmosphere, emphasizing team building, engaging team events, and a touch of after-work enjoyment!

job_title: Senior Consultant ‚Äì Strategic management of HTA submissions - London/Amsterdam/Athens/Lisbon
job_description:
About the job
            
 
Real World Commercial Solutions to Create a Healthier WorldIn RWCS we‚Äôre passionate about improving the life sciences ecosystem and making decisions that accelerate innovation for a healthier world. Every day our team develops evidence-based strategies that are used in published research, clinical guidelines, and market access decisions, to improve healthcare at every touchpoint. We design and deliver Commercial Analytics, supported by our world-class proprietary data assets, solve complex client challenges through strategic consulting, and use leading edge market research techniques to support clients brand strategy, planning and measurement. We‚Äôre purpose-driven problem solvers, that do what we love to make a greater impact on human health.EMEA Methods and Evidence Generation ‚Äì Health Economics & HTAThe IQVIA Real World Methods and Evidence Generation (RW MEG) team includes around 100 highly qualified multi-disciplinary professionals in a variety of health economics, statistics, life sciences and epidemiology-related disciplines based in 12 geographies. We help our customers design and execute an evidence generation strategy meeting payer and health technology assessment (HTA) evidence requirements and effectively communicate their product‚Äôs value story. Our Europe, Middle East, Africa (EMEA) HQ is situated next to Paddington station in London, representing a team with a European presence beyond the UK.Our clients operate in the life sciences industry, including the global top 20 pharmaceutical companies, medical device and biotech companies, as well as public health providers and regulatory authorities. They are looking for insight and evidence around the safety, efficacy, effectiveness and cost-effectiveness of health care delivery systems, medical devices, and pharmaceutical products spanning the full spectrum of therapeutic and disease areas. Our diverse mix of clients, the breath of disease areas, as well as increasing access to novel data sources and methodologies provide a constant and rewarding challenge for our people.For more information about our company please visit our website: https://www.iqvia.com/The RoleIn this role, you‚Äôll be ensuring on-time and on-budget delivery of completed projects for high client satisfaction. You will work from our office in Athens, Lisbon, London or Amsterdam and report into our EMEA Regional Business Unit, with focus on the European market, supporting our Health Economics team and its HTA Evidence and Strategy Center of Excellence. Typical projects for this role include Health Technology Assessment (HTA) submissions, EU Joint Clinical Assessment (JCA), EU Joint Scientific Consultations and local scientific advice and related evidence generation projects e.g., global value dossiers, evidence and landscape assessments, systematic literature reviews, (network) meta-analyses and dissemination of the results by means of posters and manuscripts. The audience for these analyses will be various pharmaceutical, biotechnology and medical technology companies.We seek insightful, detail-oriented people that can lead teams to deliver high-quality , so we can work with our clients to make a difference in the life science industry.What You‚Äôll Be Doing Lead (end-to-end) project management and delivery whilst maintaining high levels of client satisfaction in HTA and HTA related strategic consulting projectsReviewing and analyzing client issues and performing qualitative and quantitative analysis to develop cost-effective solutions for high client satisfactionDistil strategic insights from analytics that generate value for our clientsDevelop tailored solutions to specific client problems as part of our team‚Äôs business development activitiesProviding direction and guidance to analysts, consultants and recommending improvements and alternative solutionsDeveloping and presenting detailed documentation, client reports and presentations, and providing client follow-upsManaging timelines and day-to-day communication with the client and your team membersDrive internal initiatives for the advancement of innovative methodological approachesCollaborate with other business areas and functions of the organization to deliver client services and support the development of new offeringsDeveloping your knowledge of consulting methodologies, the life sciences market, and CoE-specific expertise through on-the-job experience and trainingMentor junior team members.
Who You Are BSc or equivalent in pharmacy, biology/ life sciencesMSc or PhD or equivalent in health economics5+ years relevant experience in Health Economics and HTA working in consultancy, CRO or pharmaceutical/ biotechProject management experience with client-influencing and relationship-building skillsPrevious experience in managing end-to-end HTA submissions (obligatory)Previous exposure to at least 1 European HTA bodyExcellent attention to detail and ability to check own work so that drafts are delivered to a high qualityStrong time-management and organizational skillsAttitude to work well as a team member and to build and manage relationships in a multi-cultural environmentExcellent at presenting and communicatingStrong written and verbal communication skills with fluency in English‚Äì applications should be sent in EnglishEligibility to work without visa sponsorship
Please submit your CV in EnglishIQVIA is a leading global provider of advanced analytics, technology solutions and clinical research services to the life sciences industry. We believe in pushing the boundaries of human science and data science to make the biggest impact possible ‚Äì to help our customers create a healthier world. Learn more at https://jobs.iqvia.com
